trans-unit.source: CGI scripts run by the CGIHTTPRequestHandler class cannot execute redirects (HTTP code 302), because code 200 (script output follows) is sent prior to execution of the CGI script. This pre-empts the status code.
trans-unit.target: 由 CGIHTTPRequestHandler 类运行的CGI脚本无法执行重定向（HTTP代码302），因为在执行CGI脚本之前已发送了代码200（跟随脚本输出）。这会抢占状态代码。

trans-unit.source: CGI-based invocation via sys.stdin, sys.stdout, sys.stderr and os.environ. This is useful when you have a WSGI application and want to run it as a CGI script. Simply invoke CGIHandler().run(app), where app is the WSGI application object you wish to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 通过 sys.stdin ， sys.stdout ， sys.stderr 和 os.environ 进行基于CGI的调用。当您拥有WSGI应用程序并希望将其作为CGI脚本运行时，这很有用。只需调用 CGIHandler().run(app) ，其中 app 是您希望调用的WSGI应用程序对象。

trans-unit.target: 计算合适的元类,并创建类名空间。

trans-unit.source: Calculation of the initial rollover time is done when the handler is initialised. Calculation of subsequent rollover times is done only when rollover occurs, and rollover occurs only when emitting output. If this is not kept in mind, it might lead to some confusion. For example, if an interval of “every minute” is set, that does not mean you will always see log files with times (in the filename) separated by a minute; if, during application execution, logging output is generated more frequently than once a minute, then you can expect to see log files with times separated by a minute. If, on the other hand, logging messages are only output once every five minutes (say), then there will be gaps in the file times corresponding to the minutes where no output (and hence no rollover) occurred.
trans-unit.target: 初始化处理程序时，将完成初始翻转时间的计算。仅当发生翻转时才进行后续翻转时间的计算，而仅在发出输出时才发生翻转。如果不牢记这一点，可能会导致混乱。例如，如果将时间间隔设置为“每分钟”，这并不意味着您将始终看到日志文件中的时间（在文件名中）以一分钟为间隔。如果在应用程序执行期间，日志输出的生成频率超过一分钟一次，那么您可以期望看到日志文件的时间间隔为一分钟。另一方面，如果日志消息每五分钟仅输出一次（例如），则文件时间中将存在与没有输出（因此也没有过渡）的分钟相对应的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Call faulthandler.enable() at Python startup to install handlers for the SIGSEGV, SIGFPE, SIGABRT, SIGBUS and SIGILL signals to dump the Python traceback on a crash.
trans-unit.target: 在Python启动时调用 faulthandler.enable() 以安装 SIGSEGV ， SIGFPE ， SIGABRT ， SIGBUS 和 SIGILL 信号的处理程序，以在崩溃时转储Python追溯。

trans-unit.source: Call keyword.iskeyword() to test whether string s is a reserved identifier, such as def and class.
trans-unit.target: 调用 keyword.iskeyword() 来测试字符串 s 是否为保留标识符，例如 def 和 class 。

trans-unit.source: Call keyword.iskeyword() to test whether string s is a reserved identifier, such as def and class.
trans-unit.target: 调用 keyword.iskeyword() 来测试字符串 s 是否为保留标识符，例如 def 和 class 。

trans-unit.source: Call os.rmdir() on filename. On Windows platforms, this is wrapped with a wait loop that checks for the existence of the file.
trans-unit.target: 在filename上调用 os.rmdir() 。在Windows平台上，这用等待循环包装，该循环检查文件是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Call os.unlink() on filename. On Windows platforms, this is wrapped with a wait loop that checks for the existence fo the file.
trans-unit.target: 在filename上调用 os.unlink() 。在Windows平台上，这用等待循环包装，该循环检查文件是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Call shutil.rmtree() on path or call os.lstat() and os.rmdir() to remove a path and its contents. On Windows platforms, this is wrapped with a wait loop that checks for the existence of the files.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 shutil.rmtree() 上的路径或致电 os.lstat() 和 os.rmdir() 删除路径及其内容。在Windows平台上，这用等待循环包装，该循环检查文件是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Call func(*args), while tracing is enabled. The tracing state is saved, and restored afterwards. This is intended to be called from a debugger from a checkpoint, to recursively debug some other code.
trans-unit.target: 启用跟踪时，调用 func(*args) 。跟踪状态已保存，然后恢复。它旨在从检查点的调试器中调用，以递归方式调试其他一些代码。

trans-unit.source: Call func with arguments args and keyword arguments kwds. It blocks until the result is ready. Given this blocks, apply_async() is better suited for performing work in parallel. Additionally, func is only executed in one of the workers of the pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用参数args和关键字参数kwds调用func。它会阻塞直到结果准备就绪。给定此块， apply_async() 更适合于并行执行工作。此外，func仅在池的工作程序之一中执行。

trans-unit.source: Call func with the given arguments under control of the Trace object with the current tracing parameters.
trans-unit.target: 在具有当前跟踪参数的 Trace 对象的控制下，使用给定参数调用func。

trans-unit.source: Call and return the result of a method of the proxy’s referent.
trans-unit.target: 调用并返回代理引用对象的方法的结果。

trans-unit.source: Call count statistics can be used to identify bugs in code (surprising counts), and to identify possible inline-expansion points (high call counts). Internal time statistics can be used to identify “hot loops” that should be carefully optimized. Cumulative time statistics should be used to identify high level errors in the selection of algorithms. Note that the unusual handling of cumulative times in this profiler allows statistics for recursive implementations of algorithms to be directly compared to iterative implementations.
trans-unit.target: 调用计数统计信息可用于识别代码中的错误（令人惊讶的计数），并标识可能的内联扩展点（高调用计数）。内部时间统计信息可用于识别应仔细优化的“热循环”。在选择算法时，应使用累积时间统计信息来识别高级错误。请注意，此探查器中对累积时间的异常处理允许将算法的递归实现的统计信息直接与迭代实现进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Call the get_content() method of the content_manager, passing self as the message object, and passing along any other arguments or keywords as additional arguments. If content_manager is not specified, use the content_manager specified by the current policy.
trans-unit.target: 调用content_manager的 get_content() 方法，将self作为消息对象传递，并将其他任何参数或关键字作为附加参数传递。如果未指定content_manager，请使用当前 policy 指定的 content_manager 。

trans-unit.source: Call the set_content() method of the content_manager, passing self as the message object, and passing along any other arguments or keywords as additional arguments. If content_manager is not specified, use the content_manager specified by the current policy.
trans-unit.target: 调用content_manager的 set_content() 方法，将self作为消息对象传递，并将其他任何参数或关键字作为附加参数传递。如果未指定content_manager，请使用当前 policy 指定的 content_manager 。

trans-unit.source: Call the function (a function or method object, not a string) with the given arguments. When runcall() returns, it returns whatever the function call returned. The debugger prompt appears as soon as the function is entered.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的参数调用函数（函数或方法对象，而不是字符串）。当 runcall() 返回时，它将返回所返回的函数调用。输入功能后，调试器提示就会出现。

trans-unit.source: Call the system call getsid(). See the Unix manual for the semantics.

trans-unit.source: Call the system call setpgid() to set the process group id of the process with id pid to the process group with id pgrp. See the Unix manual for the semantics.
trans-unit.target: 调用系统调用 setpgid() 将ID为pid的进程的进程组ID设置为ID为pgrp的进程组。有关语义，请参见Unix手册。

trans-unit.source: Call the system call setpgrp() or setpgrp(0, 0) depending on which version is implemented (if any). See the Unix manual for the semantics.
trans-unit.target: 根据实现的版本（如有） setpgrp(0, 0) 调用系统调用 setpgrp() 或setpgrp（0，0）。有关语义，请参见Unix手册。

trans-unit.source: Call the system call setsid(). See the Unix manual for the semantics.
trans-unit.target: 调用系统调用 setsid() 。有关语义，请参见Unix手册。

trans-unit.source: Call the system initgroups() to initialize the group access list with all of the groups of which the specified username is a member, plus the specified group id.
trans-unit.target: 调用系统initgroups()来初始化群组访问列表,其中包括指定用户名是成员的所有群组,加上指定的群组id。

trans-unit.source: Call the underlying MessageBeep() function from the Platform API. This plays a sound as specified in the registry. The type argument specifies which sound to play; possible values are -1, MB_ICONASTERISK, MB_ICONEXCLAMATION, MB_ICONHAND, MB_ICONQUESTION, and MB_OK, all described below. The value -1 produces a “simple beep”; this is the final fallback if a sound cannot be played otherwise. If the system indicates an error, RuntimeError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 从平台API 调用基础的 MessageBeep() 函数。播放注册表中指定的声音。该类型参数指定其播放声音; 可能的值是 -1 ， MB_ICONASTERISK ， MB_ICONEXCLAMATION ， MB_ICONHAND ， MB_ICONQUESTION ，和 MB_OK ，下面的所有描述。值 -1 产生“简单的哔哔声”；如果无法播放声音，则这是最终的回退。如果系统指示错误，则会引发 RuntimeError 。

trans-unit.source: Call the underlying PlaySound() function from the Platform API. The sound parameter may be a filename, a system sound alias, audio data as a bytes-like object, or None. Its interpretation depends on the value of flags, which can be a bitwise ORed combination of the constants described below. If the sound parameter is None, any currently playing waveform sound is stopped. If the system indicates an error, RuntimeError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 从平台API 调用基础的 PlaySound() 函数。的声音参数可以是文件名，一个系统声音别名，音频数据作为一个字节状物体，或 None 。它的解释取决于flags的值，它可以是下面描述的常数的按位“或”组合。如果sound参数为 None ，则停止任何当前播放的波形声音。如果系统指示错误，则会引发 RuntimeError 。

trans-unit.source: Call the underlying PlaySound() function from the Platform API. The sound parameter may be a filename, a system sound alias, audio data as a bytes-like object, or None. Its interpretation depends on the value of flags, which can be a bitwise ORed combination of the constants described below. If the sound parameter is None, any currently playing waveform sound is stopped. If the system indicates an error, RuntimeError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 从平台API调用基础的 PlaySound() 函数。的声音参数可以是文件名，一个系统声音别名，音频数据作为一个字节状物体，或 None 。它的解释取决于flags的值，它可以是下面描述的常数的按位“或”组合。如果sound参数为 None ，则任何当前播放的波形声音都会停止。如果系统指示错误，则会引发 RuntimeError 。

trans-unit.target: Callable

trans-unit.source: Callable object that constructs a test suite from a list of tests. No methods on the resulting object are needed. The default value is the TestSuite class.
trans-unit.target: 从测试列表构造测试套件的可调用对象。在结果对象上不需要任何方法。默认值为 TestSuite 类。

trans-unit.target: 可调用类型； Callable[[int], str] 是（int）-> str的函数。

trans-unit.source: Callback Handles
trans-unit.target: 回调句柄

trans-unit.source: Callback functions
trans-unit.target: 回调功能

trans-unit.source: Callbacks are called in the order in which they are registered. Each callback will be called exactly once.
trans-unit.target: 回调按其注册的顺序被调用。每个回调将被准确地调用一次。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks registered with asyncio.Future.add_done_callback() are not called immediately. They are scheduled with loop.call_soon() instead.
trans-unit.target: 在 asyncio.Future.add_done_callback() 中注册的回调不会立即被调用。它们是使用 loop.call_soon() 安排的。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks should complete immediately since otherwise the thread which handles the results will get blocked.
trans-unit.target: 回调应立即完成,否则处理结果的线程将被阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks taking longer than 100ms are logged. The loop.slow_callback_duration attribute can be used to set the minimum execution duration in seconds that is considered “slow”.
trans-unit.target: 记录时间超过100毫秒的回调。所述 loop.slow_callback_duration 属性可以被用来设置在秒的最小执行持续时间被认为是“慢”。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks to Python for the various steps of MSI creation are currently not exposed.
trans-unit.target: 对Python创建MSI的各个步骤的回调目前还没有暴露。

trans-unit.source: Called after the handle() method to perform any clean-up actions required. The default implementation does nothing. If setup() raises an exception, this function will not be called.
trans-unit.target: 在 handle() 方法之后调用以执行所需的任何清理操作。默认实现不执行任何操作。如果 setup() 引发异常，则不会调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Called after the test case test has been executed, regardless of the outcome.
trans-unit.target: 不管结果如何，在执行完测试用例测试之后调用。

trans-unit.source: Called at the end of a CDATA section.
trans-unit.target: 在CDATA部分结束时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called at the start of a CDATA section. This and EndCdataSectionHandler are needed to be able to identify the syntactical start and end for CDATA sections.
trans-unit.target: 在CDATA节的开头调用。需要使用此和 EndCdataSectionHandler 来识别CDATA节的句法起点和终点。

trans-unit.source: Called before the handle() method to perform any initialization actions required. The default implementation does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 在 handle() 方法之前调用，以执行所需的任何初始化操作。默认实现不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Called by the parser to give the application a locator for locating the origin of document events.
trans-unit.target: 由解析器调用,为应用程序提供一个定位器,用于定位文档事件的来源。

trans-unit.source: Called by the server’s constructor to activate the server. The default behavior for a TCP server just invokes listen() on the server’s socket. May be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 由服务器的构造函数调用以激活服务器。TCP服务器的默认行为只是在服务器套接字上调用 listen() 。可能会被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Called by the server’s constructor to bind the socket to the desired address. May be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 由服务器的构造函数调用，以将套接字绑定到所需的地址。可能会被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Called each time around the asynchronous loop to determine whether a channel’s socket should be added to the list on which read events can occur. The default method simply returns True, indicating that by default, all channels will be interested in read events.
trans-unit.target: 每次绕异步循环调用一次，以确定是否将通道的套接字添加到可能发生读取事件的列表中。默认方法仅返回 True ，指示默认情况下，所有通道都将对读取事件感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: Called each time around the asynchronous loop to determine whether a channel’s socket should be added to the list on which write events can occur. The default method simply returns True, indicating that by default, all channels will be interested in write events.
trans-unit.target: 每次围绕异步循环调用一次，以确定是否将通道的套接字添加到可能发生写事件的列表中。默认方法仅返回 True ，指示默认情况下，所有通道都将对写入事件感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: Called for all entity declarations. For parameter and internal entities, value will be a string giving the declared contents of the entity; this will be None for external entities. The notationName parameter will be None for parsed entities, and the name of the notation for unparsed entities. is_parameter_entity will be true if the entity is a parameter entity or false for general entities (most applications only need to be concerned with general entities). This is only available starting with version 1.95.0 of the Expat library.
trans-unit.target: 要求所有实体声明。对于参数实体和内部实体，value将是给出实体声明内容的字符串；对于外部实体，将为“ None ”。该notationName参数将是 None 的解析实体和符号的未解析实体的名称。如果实体是参数实体，则is_parameter_entity将为true；对于一般实体，is_parameter_entity将为false（大多数应用程序只需要与一般实体有关）。仅从Expat库的1.95.0版开始可用。

trans-unit.source: Called for any characters in the XML document for which no applicable handler has been specified. This means characters that are part of a construct which could be reported, but for which no handler has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 对XML文档中没有指定处理程序的任何字符进行调用。这意味着那些属于可以报告的结构的字符,但没有提供处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Called for character data. This will be called for normal character data, CDATA marked content, and ignorable whitespace. Applications which must distinguish these cases can use the StartCdataSectionHandler, EndCdataSectionHandler, and ElementDeclHandler callbacks to collect the required information.
trans-unit.target: 要求输入字符数据。正常字符数据，CDATA标记的内容和可忽略的空白将被调用。必须区分这些情况的应用程序可以使用 StartCdataSectionHandler ， EndCdataSectionHandler 和 ElementDeclHandler 回调来收集所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: Called for comments. data is the text of the comment, excluding the leading '<!--' and trailing '-->'.
trans-unit.target: 征求意见。data是注释的文本，不包括开头的 '<!- -' 和结尾的 '- ->' 。

trans-unit.source: Called for each declared attribute for an element type. If an attribute list declaration declares three attributes, this handler is called three times, once for each attribute. elname is the name of the element to which the declaration applies and attname is the name of the attribute declared. The attribute type is a string passed as type; the possible values are 'CDATA', 'ID', 'IDREF', … default gives the default value for the attribute used when the attribute is not specified by the document instance, or None if there is no default value (#IMPLIED values). If the attribute is required to be given in the document instance, required will be true. This requires Expat version 1.95.0 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 为元素类型的每个声明的属性调用。如果属性列表声明声明了三个属性，则此处理程序将被调用三次，每个属性一次。elname是该声明应用和元素的名称attname是声明的属性的名称。属性类型是作为类型传递的字符串;可能的值为 'CDATA' ， 'ID' ， 'IDREF' …… default为文档实例未指定属性时使用的属性提供默认值，如果没有默认值则为 None （ #IMPLIED 值）。如果需要的属性，文档实例给予，需要为真。这需要Expat 1.95.0或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Called for every processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: 每次处理指令都会被调用。

trans-unit.source: Called for notation declarations. notationName, base, and systemId, and publicId are strings if given. If the public identifier is omitted, publicId will be None.
trans-unit.target: 要求符号声明。notationName，base和systemId以及publicId是字符串（如果给出）。如果省略公共标识符，则publicId将为 None 。

trans-unit.source: Called for references to external entities. base is the current base, as set by a previous call to SetBase(). The public and system identifiers, systemId and publicId, are strings if given; if the public identifier is not given, publicId will be None. The context value is opaque and should only be used as described below.
trans-unit.target: 要求引用外部实体。base是当前的基数，由先前对 SetBase() 的调用设置。公用标识符和系统标识符systemId和publicId是字符串（如果给出）；如果未提供公共标识符，则publicId将为 None 。的上下文值是不透明的，并且如下所述仅应使用。

trans-unit.source: Called for the end of every element.
trans-unit.target: 每一个元素的结束都会被调用。

trans-unit.source: Called for the start of every element. name is a string containing the element name, and attributes is the element attributes. If ordered_attributes is true, this is a list (see ordered_attributes for a full description). Otherwise it’s a dictionary mapping names to values.
trans-unit.target: 要求开始每个元素。name是包含元素名称的字符串，而attribute是元素属性。如果 ordered_attributes 为true，则这是一个列表（有关完整说明，请参见 ordered_attributes ）。否则，它是一个将名称映射到值的字典。

trans-unit.source: Called for unparsed (NDATA) entity declarations. This is only present for version 1.2 of the Expat library; for more recent versions, use EntityDeclHandler instead. (The underlying function in the Expat library has been declared obsolete.)
trans-unit.target: 调用未解析的（NDATA）实体声明。仅适用于Expat库的1.2版。有关最新版本，请改用 EntityDeclHandler 。（Expat库中的基础功能已被宣布作废。）

trans-unit.source: Called if the XML document hasn’t been declared as being a standalone document. This happens when there is an external subset or a reference to a parameter entity, but the XML declaration does not set standalone to yes in an XML declaration. If this handler returns 0, then the parser will raise an XML_ERROR_NOT_STANDALONE error. If this handler is not set, no exception is raised by the parser for this condition.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未将XML文档声明为独立文档，则调用此方法。当存在外部子集或对参数实体的引用，但是XML声明在XML声明中未将独立声明设置为 yes 时，会发生这种情况。如果此处理程序返回 0 ，则解析器将引发 XML_ERROR_NOT_STANDALONE 错误。如果未设置此处理程序，则解析器不会针对这种情况引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Called on listening channels (passive openers) when a connection can be established with a new remote endpoint that has issued a connect() call for the local endpoint. Deprecated in version 3.2; use handle_accepted() instead.
trans-unit.target: 当可以与发出对本地端点的 connect() 调用的新远程端点建立连接时，在侦听通道（被动打开程序）上调用。在版本3.2中弃用；使用 handle_accepted() 代替。

trans-unit.source: Called on listening channels (passive openers) when a connection has been established with a new remote endpoint that has issued a connect() call for the local endpoint. sock is a new socket object usable to send and receive data on the connection, and addr is the address bound to the socket on the other end of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 与新的远程端点建立连接后在侦听通道（被动打开器 connect() 调用，该端点已发出对本地端点的connect（）调用。sock是一个新的套接字对象，可用于在连接上发送和接收数据，而addr是绑定到连接另一端上的套接字的地址。

trans-unit.source: Called once after all tests are executed.
trans-unit.target: 所有测试执行完毕后调用一次。

trans-unit.source: Called once before any tests are executed.
trans-unit.target: 在执行任何测试之前调用一次。

trans-unit.source: Called once for each element type declaration. name is the name of the element type, and model is a representation of the content model.
trans-unit.target: 为每个元素类型声明调用一次。name是元素类型的名称，而model是内容模型的表示。

trans-unit.source: Called to allocate a new receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 调用来分配一个新的接收缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Called when Expat begins parsing the document type declaration (<!DOCTYPE ...). The doctypeName is provided exactly as presented. The systemId and publicId parameters give the system and public identifiers if specified, or None if omitted. has_internal_subset will be true if the document contains and internal document declaration subset. This requires Expat version 1.2 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 当Expat开始解析文档类型声明（ <!DOCTYPE ... ）时调用。该doctypeName提供准确的呈现。所述的systenId和publicId参数给系统，并且如果指定的公开识别符，或 None 如果删去。如果文档包含内部文档声明子集，则has_internal_subset为true。这需要Expat 1.2版或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Called when Expat is done parsing the document type declaration. This requires Expat version 1.2 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 当Expat完成解析文档类型声明时调用。这需要Expat 1.2或更新的版本。

trans-unit.source: Called when a connection is made.
trans-unit.target: 连接时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when a datagram is received.
trans-unit.target: 当收到数据报时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when a datagram is received. data is a bytes object containing the incoming data. addr is the address of the peer sending the data; the exact format depends on the transport.
trans-unit.target: 收到数据报时调用。data是包含输入数据的字节对象。addr是发送数据的对等方的地址；确切的格式取决于运输方式。

trans-unit.source: Called when a header is added to an EmailMessage or Message object. If the returned value is not 0 or None, and there are already a number of headers with the name name greater than or equal to the value returned, a ValueError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 将标头添加到 EmailMessage 或 Message 对象时调用。如果返回的值不是 0 或 None ，并且已经有多个标题名称大于或等于返回值的标头，则会引发 ValueError 。

trans-unit.source: Called when a previous send or receive operation raises an OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的发送或接收操作引发 OSError 时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when a previous send or receive operation raises an OSError. exc is the OSError instance.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的发送或接收操作引发 OSError 时调用。exc是 OSError 实例。

trans-unit.source: Called when a subtest finishes. test is the test case corresponding to the test method. subtest is a custom TestCase instance describing the subtest.
trans-unit.target: 子测试完成时调用。test是与测试方法相对应的测试用例。子测试是描述子测试的自定义 TestCase 实例。

trans-unit.source: Called when an EOF is received.
trans-unit.target: 收到EOF时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when an element contains a namespace declaration. Namespace declarations are processed before the StartElementHandler is called for the element on which declarations are placed.
trans-unit.target: 当元素包含名称空间声明时调用。在放置声明的元素调用 StartElementHandler 之前，将处理命名空间声明。

trans-unit.source: Called when an exception has occurred but there is no way for Python to handle it. For example, when a destructor raises an exception or during garbage collection (gc.collect()).
trans-unit.target: 在发生异常但Python无法处理它时调用。例如，当析构函数引发异常时或在垃圾回收期间（ gc.collect() ）。

trans-unit.source: Called when an exception is raised and not otherwise handled. The default version prints a condensed traceback.
trans-unit.target: 当发生异常而没有进行其他处理时调用。默认版本会打印一个简明的回溯。

trans-unit.source: Called when one of the pipes communicating with the child process is closed.
trans-unit.target: 当与子进程通信的管道之一被关闭时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when some data is received.
trans-unit.target: 当收到一些数据时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when some data is received. data is a non-empty bytes object containing the incoming data.
trans-unit.target: 收到一些数据时调用。data是包含输入数据的非空字节对象。

trans-unit.source: Called when the XML declaration is parsed. The XML declaration is the (optional) declaration of the applicable version of the XML recommendation, the encoding of the document text, and an optional “standalone” declaration. version and encoding will be strings, and standalone will be 1 if the document is declared standalone, 0 if it is declared not to be standalone, or -1 if the standalone clause was omitted. This is only available with Expat version 1.95.0 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 解析XML声明时调用。XML声明是适用的XML建议版本的（可选）声明，文档文本的编码以及可选的“独立”声明。版本和编码将是字符串，并且独立的将是 1 ，如果文档被声明独立， 0 ，如果它被声明不被独立，或 -1 ，如果省略了独立子句。仅适用于Expat 1.95.0或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Called when the active opener’s socket actually makes a connection. Might send a “welcome” banner, or initiate a protocol negotiation with the remote endpoint, for example.
trans-unit.target: 当主动开启器的套接字实际建立连接时调用。例如，可能发送“欢迎”标语，或发起与远程端点的协议协商。

trans-unit.source: Called when the asynchronous loop detects that a read() call on the channel’s socket will succeed.
trans-unit.target: 当异步循环检测到通道套接字上的 read() 调用将成功时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the asynchronous loop detects that a writable socket can be written. Often this method will implement the necessary buffering for performance. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当异步循环检测到一个可写的套接字可以被写入时调用。通常这个方法会实现必要的缓冲以提高性能。例如

trans-unit.source: Called when the buffer was updated with the received data.
trans-unit.target: 当缓冲区更新了接收到的数据时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the child process has exited.
trans-unit.target: 当子程序退出时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the child process writes data into its stdout or stderr pipe.
trans-unit.target: 当子进程将数据写入其stdout或stderr管道时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the child process writes data into its stdout or stderr pipe.
trans-unit.target: 当子进程将数据写入stdout或stderr管道时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the closing tag is reached for an element that contained a namespace declaration. This is called once for each namespace declaration on the element in the reverse of the order for which the StartNamespaceDeclHandler was called to indicate the start of each namespace declaration’s scope. Calls to this handler are made after the corresponding EndElementHandler for the end of the element.
trans-unit.target: 当包含命名空间声明的元素到达结束标记时调用。对于元素上的每个名称空间声明，将以与调用 StartNamespaceDeclHandler 的顺序相反的顺序调用一次，以指示每个名称空间声明的作用域的开始。在元素末尾的相应 EndElementHandler 之后进行对此处理程序的调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the connection is lost or closed.
trans-unit.target: 当连接丢失或关闭时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the incoming data stream matches the termination condition set by set_terminator(). The default method, which must be overridden, raises a NotImplementedError exception. The buffered input data should be available via an instance attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当输入数据流符合 set_terminator() 设置的终止条件时调用。必须重写的默认方法会引发 NotImplementedError 异常。缓冲的输入数据应通过instance属性可用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the other end signals it won’t send any more data (for example by calling transport.write_eof(), if the other end also uses asyncio).
trans-unit.target: 在另一端发出信号将不再发送任何数据时调用 transport.write_eof() 例如，如果另一端也使用asyncio，则通过调用transport.write_eof（））。

trans-unit.source: Called when the parser encounters a recoverable error. If this method does not raise an exception, parsing may continue, but further document information should not be expected by the application. Allowing the parser to continue may allow additional errors to be discovered in the input document.
trans-unit.target: 当解析器遇到一个可恢复的错误时调用。如果此方法没有引起异常,解析可以继续进行,但应用程序不应期望得到更多的文档信息。允许解析器继续解析可能会在输入文档中发现更多的错误。

trans-unit.source: Called when the parser encounters an error it cannot recover from; parsing is expected to terminate when this method returns.
trans-unit.target: 当解析器遇到无法恢复的错误时调用;当本方法返回时,解析将被终止。

trans-unit.source: Called when the parser presents minor warning information to the application. Parsing is expected to continue when this method returns, and document information will continue to be passed to the application. Raising an exception in this method will cause parsing to end.
trans-unit.target: 当解析器向应用程序提交轻微警告信息时调用。当本方法返回时,解析将继续进行,文档信息将继续传递给应用程序。在本方法中引发异常将导致解析结束。

trans-unit.source: Called when the socket is closed.
trans-unit.target: 当插座关闭时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the test case test fails, but was marked with the expectedFailure() decorator.
trans-unit.target: 在测试用例测试失败时被调用，但被标记为 expectedFailure() 装饰器。

trans-unit.source: Called when the test case test is about to be run.
trans-unit.target: 在测试用例测试即将运行时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the test case test is skipped. reason is the reason the test gave for skipping.
trans-unit.target: 跳过测试用例测试时调用。原因是测试给出跳过的原因。

trans-unit.source: Called when the test case test raises an unexpected exception. err is a tuple of the form returned by sys.exc_info(): (type, value, traceback).
trans-unit.target: 在测试用例测试引发意外异常时调用。err是 sys.exc_info() 返回的形式的元组： (type, value, traceback) 。

trans-unit.source: Called when the test case test signals a failure. err is a tuple of the form returned by sys.exc_info(): (type, value, traceback).
trans-unit.target: 在测试用例测试发出失败信号时调用。err是 sys.exc_info() 返回的形式的元组： (type, value, traceback) 。

trans-unit.source: Called when the test case test succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 在测试用例测试成功时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the test case test was marked with the expectedFailure() decorator, but succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 在测试用例测试标记有 expectedFailure() 装饰器但成功时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the transport’s buffer drains below the low water mark.
trans-unit.target: 当运输工具的缓冲液排放到低水位以下时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the transport’s buffer drains below the low watermark.
trans-unit.target: 当传输缓冲区的水位低于低水位线时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the transport’s buffer goes over the high water mark.
trans-unit.target: 当传输缓冲区超过高水位线时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the transport’s buffer goes over the high watermark.
trans-unit.target: 在传输缓冲区超过高水位线时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when there is out of band (OOB) data for a socket connection. This will almost never happen, as OOB is tenuously supported and rarely used.
trans-unit.target: 当插座连接有带外(OOB)数据时调用。这几乎不会发生,因为OOB的支持非常有限,而且很少使用。

trans-unit.source: Called with data holding an arbitrary amount of received data. The default method, which must be overridden, raises a NotImplementedError exception.
trans-unit.target: 称为与数据保持接收到的数据的任意量。必须重写的默认方法会引发 NotImplementedError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Calling
trans-unit.target: Calling

trans-unit.source: Calling Executor or Future methods from a callable submitted to a ProcessPoolExecutor will result in deadlock.
trans-unit.target: 从提交到 ProcessPoolExecutor 的可调用对象调用 Executor 或 Future 方法将导致死锁。

trans-unit.source: Calling putenv() directly does not change os.environ, so it’s better to modify os.environ.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用 putenv() 不会更改 os.environ ，因此最好修改 os.environ 。

trans-unit.source: Calling sys.addaudithook() will itself raise an auditing event named sys.addaudithook with no arguments. If any existing hooks raise an exception derived from RuntimeError, the new hook will not be added and the exception suppressed. As a result, callers cannot assume that their hook has been added unless they control all existing hooks.
trans-unit.target: 调用 sys.addaudithook() 本身会引发一个名为 sys.addaudithook 的审核事件，不带任何参数。如果任何现有的挂钩引发了从 RuntimeError 派生的异常，则不会添加新的挂钩并且抑制了该异常。如此一来，除非调用者控制了所有现有的钩子，否则无法假定它们的钩子已被添加。

trans-unit.source: Calling loop.set_debug().
trans-unit.target: 调用 loop.set_debug() 。

trans-unit.source: Calling help() on methods or functions displays the docstrings:
trans-unit.target: 在方法或函数上调用 help() 将显示文档字符串：

trans-unit.source: Calling repr() or str() on a generic shows the parameterized type:
trans-unit.target: 在泛型上调用 repr() 或 str() 会显示参数化类型：

trans-unit.source: Calling select() tells you that the OS-level socket can be read from (or written to), but it does not imply that there is sufficient data at the upper SSL layer. For example, only part of an SSL frame might have arrived. Therefore, you must be ready to handle SSLSocket.recv() and SSLSocket.send() failures, and retry after another call to select().
trans-unit.target: 调用 select() 告诉您可以从（或向）读取OS级别的套接字，但这并不意味着上层SSL层有足够的数据。例如，可能只有一部分SSL帧到达。因此，您必须准备好处理 SSLSocket.recv() 和 SSLSocket.send() 失败，并在再次调用 select() 之后重试。

trans-unit.source: Calling bytes is only recommended under Unix. Under Windows, the unicode form is the canonical representation of filesystem paths.
trans-unit.target: 仅在Unix下才建议调用 bytes 。在Windows下，unicode形式是文件系统路径的规范表示。

trans-unit.source: Calling sys.exit() or raising the SystemExit exception is equivalent to calling _thread.exit().
trans-unit.target: 调用 sys.exit() 或引发 SystemExit 异常等效于调用 _thread.exit() 。

trans-unit.source: Calling bytes() on a Headers object returns a formatted bytestring suitable for transmission as HTTP response headers. Each header is placed on a line with its value, separated by a colon and a space. Each line is terminated by a carriage return and line feed, and the bytestring is terminated with a blank line.
trans-unit.target: 在 Headers 对象上调用 bytes() 返回适合于作为HTTP响应标头传输的格式化字节串。每个标头均以其值放在一行中，并用冒号和空格分隔。每行以回车和换行符结尾，字节串以空行结尾。

trans-unit.source: Calling freeze_support() has no effect when invoked on any operating system other than Windows. In addition, if the module is being run normally by the Python interpreter on Windows (the program has not been frozen), then freeze_support() has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows以外的任何操作系统上调用 freeze_support() 均无效。另外，如果该模块由Windows上的Python解释器正常运行（该程序尚未冻结），则 freeze_support() 无效。

trans-unit.source: Calling main actually returns an instance of the TestProgram class. This stores the result of the tests run as the result attribute.
trans-unit.target: 调用 main 实际上会返回 TestProgram 类的实例。这会将测试的结果存储为 result 属性。

trans-unit.source: Calling reset_tzpath will not invalidate the ZoneInfo cache, and so calls to the primary ZoneInfo constructor will only use the new TZPATH in the case of a cache miss.
trans-unit.target: 调用 reset_tzpath 不会使 ZoneInfo 缓存无效，因此，在发生缓存未命中的情况下，对主要 ZoneInfo 构造函数的调用将仅使用新的 TZPATH 。

trans-unit.source: Calling a GzipFile object’s close() method does not close fileobj, since you might wish to append more material after the compressed data. This also allows you to pass an io.BytesIO object opened for writing as fileobj, and retrieve the resulting memory buffer using the io.BytesIO object’s getvalue() method.
trans-unit.target: 调用 GzipFile 对象的 close() 方法不会关闭fileobj，因为您可能希望在压缩数据之后附加更多材料。这也允许您传递一个打开的 io.BytesIO 对象以作为fileobj进行写入，并使用 io.BytesIO 对象的 getvalue() 方法检索结果内存缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Calling functions
trans-unit.target: 调用功能

trans-unit.source: Calling functions with your own custom data types
trans-unit.target: 使用自己的自定义数据类型调用函数

trans-unit.source: Calling functions, continued
trans-unit.target: 呼叫功能,续

trans-unit.source: Calling the pointer type without an argument creates a NULL pointer. NULL pointers have a False boolean value:
trans-unit.target: 调用不带参数的指针类型将创建一个 NULL 指针。 NULL 指针具有 False 布尔值：

trans-unit.source: Calling the program through the shell is usually not required.
trans-unit.target: 通过shell调用程序通常是不需要的。

trans-unit.source: Calling this during a test method or setUp() skips the current test. See Skipping tests and expected failures for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在测试方法或 setUp() 期间调用此方法会跳过当前测试。有关更多信息，请参见跳过测试和预期的失败。

trans-unit.source: Calling this has the side effect of “joining” any processes which have already finished.

trans-unit.source: Calls a callable object with positional (if any) and keyword arguments. argc indicates the total number of positional and keyword arguments. The top element on the stack contains a tuple of keyword argument names. Below that are keyword arguments in the order corresponding to the tuple. Below that are positional arguments, with the right-most parameter on top. Below the arguments is a callable object to call. CALL_FUNCTION_KW pops all arguments and the callable object off the stack, calls the callable object with those arguments, and pushes the return value returned by the callable object.
trans-unit.target: 调用带有位置（如果有）和关键字参数的可调用对象。argc表示位置和关键字参数的总数。堆栈的顶部元素包含关键字参数名称的元组。在其下是按与元组相对应的顺序的关键字参数。下面是位置参数，最右边的参数在顶部。参数下方是要调用的可调用对象。 CALL_FUNCTION_KW 将所有参数和可调用对象弹出堆栈，使用这些参数调用可调用对象，并推送可调用对象返回的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Calls a callable object with positional (if any) and keyword arguments. argc indicates the total number of positional and keyword arguments. The top element on the stack contains a tuple with the names of the keyword arguments, which must be strings. Below that are the values for the keyword arguments, in the order corresponding to the tuple. Below that are positional arguments, with the right-most parameter on top. Below the arguments is a callable object to call. CALL_FUNCTION_KW pops all arguments and the callable object off the stack, calls the callable object with those arguments, and pushes the return value returned by the callable object.
trans-unit.target: 调用带有位置（如果有）和关键字参数的可调用对象。argc表示位置参数和关键字参数的总数。堆栈顶部的元素包含一个带有关键字参数名称的元组，该参数必须是字符串。在下面是关键字参数的值，按照与元组相对应的顺序。下面是位置参数，最右边的参数在顶部。参数下方是要调用的可调用对象。 CALL_FUNCTION_KW 将所有参数和可调用对象弹出堆栈，使用这些参数调用可调用对象，并推送可调用对象返回的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Calls a callable object with positional arguments. argc indicates the number of positional arguments. The top of the stack contains positional arguments, with the right-most argument on top. Below the arguments is a callable object to call. CALL_FUNCTION pops all arguments and the callable object off the stack, calls the callable object with those arguments, and pushes the return value returned by the callable object.
trans-unit.target: 用位置参数调用可调用对象。argc表示位置参数的数量。堆栈的顶部包含位置参数，最右边的参数位于顶部。参数下方是要调用的可调用对象。 CALL_FUNCTION 将所有参数和可调用对象弹出堆栈，使用这些参数调用可调用对象，并推送可调用对象返回的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Calls a callable object with variable set of positional and keyword arguments. If the lowest bit of flags is set, the top of the stack contains a mapping object containing additional keyword arguments. Before the callable is called, the mapping object and iterable object are each “unpacked” and their contents passed in as keyword and positional arguments respectively. CALL_FUNCTION_EX pops all arguments and the callable object off the stack, calls the callable object with those arguments, and pushes the return value returned by the callable object.
trans-unit.target: 用位置和关键字参数的可变集调用可调用对象。如果标志的最低位被设置，则堆栈的顶部将包含一个映射对象，该映射对象包含其他关键字参数。在调用callable之前，分别将映射对象和可迭代对象“解包”，并将它们的内容分别作为关键字和位置参数传递。 CALL_FUNCTION_EX 将所有参数和可调用对象弹出堆栈，使用这些参数调用可调用对象，并推送可调用对象返回的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Calls a callable object with variable set of positional and keyword arguments. If the lowest bit of flags is set, the top of the stack contains a mapping object containing additional keyword arguments. Below that is an iterable object containing positional arguments and a callable object to call. BUILD_MAP_UNPACK_WITH_CALL and BUILD_TUPLE_UNPACK_WITH_CALL can be used for merging multiple mapping objects and iterables containing arguments. Before the callable is called, the mapping object and iterable object are each “unpacked” and their contents passed in as keyword and positional arguments respectively. CALL_FUNCTION_EX pops all arguments and the callable object off the stack, calls the callable object with those arguments, and pushes the return value returned by the callable object.
trans-unit.target: 用位置和关键字参数的可变集调用可调用对象。如果标志的最低位被设置，则堆栈的顶部将包含一个映射对象，该映射对象包含其他关键字参数。在其下是一个可迭代的对象，其中包含位置参数和要调用的可调用对象。 BUILD_MAP_UNPACK_WITH_CALL 和 BUILD_TUPLE_UNPACK_WITH_CALL 可用于合并多个映射对象和包含参数的可迭代对象。在调用callable之前，分别将映射对象和可迭代对象“解包”，并将它们的内容分别作为关键字和位置参数传递。 CALL_FUNCTION_EX 从堆栈中弹出所有参数和可调用对象，使用这些参数调用可调用对象，然后推入可调用对象返回的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Calls a method. argc is number of positional arguments. Keyword arguments are not supported. This opcode is designed to be used with LOAD_METHOD. Positional arguments are on top of the stack. Below them, two items described in LOAD_METHOD on the stack. All of them are popped and return value is pushed.
trans-unit.target: 调用方法。argc是位置参数的数量。不支持关键字参数。该操作码设计用于 LOAD_METHOD 。位置参数位于堆栈的顶部。在它们下面，堆栈上的 LOAD_METHOD 中描述了两项。它们全部弹出，并返回值。

trans-unit.source: Calls a method. argc is the number of positional arguments. Keyword arguments are not supported. This opcode is designed to be used with LOAD_METHOD. Positional arguments are on top of the stack. Below them, the two items described in LOAD_METHOD are on the stack (either self and an unbound method object or NULL and an arbitrary callable). All of them are popped and the return value is pushed.
trans-unit.target: 调用方法。argc是位置参数的数量。不支持关键字参数。该操作码设计用于 LOAD_METHOD 。位置参数位于堆栈的顶部。在它们的下面， LOAD_METHOD 中描述的两项在堆栈上（ self 和unbound方法对象或 NULL 和任意可调用）。它们全部弹出，并返回返回值。

trans-unit.source: Canonicalization is a way to normalise XML output in a way that allows byte-by-byte comparisons and digital signatures. It reduced the freedom that XML serializers have and instead generates a more constrained XML representation. The main restrictions regard the placement of namespace declarations, the ordering of attributes, and ignorable whitespace.
trans-unit.target: Canonicalization是一种将XML输出规范化的方式,它允许逐字节比较和数字签名。它减少了XML序列化器所拥有的自由度,而是生成了一个更受限制的XML表示。主要的限制涉及命名空间声明的位置、属性的排序和可忽略的空白。

trans-unit.source: Capture enough detail about a non-file-based module to permit getting its lines later via getline() even if module_globals is None in the later call. This avoids doing I/O until a line is actually needed, without having to carry the module globals around indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 捕获有关非基于文件的模块的足够详细信息，以允许以后通过 getline() 获取其行，即使在以后的调用中module_globals为 None 也不行。这样可以避免在实际需要一条线之前进行I / O操作，而不必无限期地携带模块全局变量。

trans-unit.source: Casefolding is similar to lowercasing but more aggressive because it is intended to remove all case distinctions in a string. For example, the German lowercase letter 'ß' is equivalent to "ss". Since it is already lowercase, lower() would do nothing to 'ß'; casefold() converts it to "ss".
trans-unit.target: 大小写折叠类似于小写字母，但更具攻击性，因为它旨在删除字符串中的所有大小写区别。例如，德语小写字母 'ß' 等效于 "ss" 。由于它已经是小写字母，所以 lower() 对 'ß' 无效； casefold() 将其转换为 "ss" 。

trans-unit.source: Cause requests to go through a proxy. If proxies is given, it must be a dictionary mapping protocol names to URLs of proxies. The default is to read the list of proxies from the environment variables <protocol>_proxy. If no proxy environment variables are set, then in a Windows environment proxy settings are obtained from the registry’s Internet Settings section, and in a Mac OS X environment proxy information is retrieved from the OS X System Configuration Framework.
trans-unit.target: 使请求通过代理。如果给出了代理，则它必须是将协议名称映射到代理URL的字典。默认是从环境变量 <protocol>_proxy 读取代理列表。如果未设置代理环境变量，则在Windows环境中，可从注册表的“ Internet设置”部分获取代理设置，而在Mac OS X环境中，可从OS X系统配置框架检索代理信息。

trans-unit.source: Causes the resulting RE to match 0 or 1 repetitions of the preceding RE. ab? will match either ‘a’ or ‘ab’.
trans-unit.target: 使结果RE匹配先前RE的0或1个重复。 ab? 将匹配“ a”或“ ab”。

trans-unit.source: Causes the resulting RE to match 0 or more repetitions of the preceding RE, as many repetitions as are possible. ab* will match ‘a’, ‘ab’, or ‘a’ followed by any number of ‘b’s.
trans-unit.target: 使结果RE与前面的RE的0个或多个重复匹配，并尽可能多地重复。 ab* 将匹配“ a”，“ ab”或“ a”，后跟任意数量的“ b”。

trans-unit.source: Causes the resulting RE to match 1 or more repetitions of the preceding RE. ab+ will match ‘a’ followed by any non-zero number of ‘b’s; it will not match just ‘a’.
trans-unit.target: 使结果RE匹配先前RE的1个或多个重复。 ab+ 将匹配“ a”，后跟任意非零数目的“ b”；它不会仅匹配“ a”。

trans-unit.source: Causes the resulting RE to match from m to n repetitions of the preceding RE, attempting to match as few repetitions as possible. This is the non-greedy version of the previous qualifier. For example, on the 6-character string 'aaaaaa', a{3,5} will match 5 'a' characters, while a{3,5}? will only match 3 characters.
trans-unit.target: 使结果RE匹配先前RE的m到n个重复，并尝试匹配尽可能少的重复。这是前一个限定词的非贪婪版本。例如，在6个字符的字符串 'aaaaaa' 上， a{3,5} 将匹配5个 'a' 字符，而 a{3,5}? 只能匹配3个字符。

trans-unit.source: Causes the resulting RE to match from m to n repetitions of the preceding RE, attempting to match as many repetitions as possible. For example, a{3,5} will match from 3 to 5 'a' characters. Omitting m specifies a lower bound of zero, and omitting n specifies an infinite upper bound. As an example, a{4,}b will match 'aaaab' or a thousand 'a' characters followed by a 'b', but not 'aaab'. The comma may not be omitted or the modifier would be confused with the previously described form.
trans-unit.target: 使结果RE匹配先前RE的m到n个重复，并尝试匹配尽可能多的重复。例如， a{3,5} 将匹配3到5个 'a' 字符。省略m表示下限为零，省略n表示上限为无限。例如， a{4,}b 将匹配 'aaaab' 或一千个 'a' 字符，后跟一个 'b' ，但不 'aaab' 。逗号不能省略，否则修饰符会与前面描述的形式混淆。

trans-unit.source: Caution: Because a WeakKeyDictionary is built on top of a Python dictionary, it must not change size when iterating over it. This can be difficult to ensure for a WeakKeyDictionary because actions performed by the program during iteration may cause items in the dictionary to vanish “by magic” (as a side effect of garbage collection).
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于 WeakKeyDictionary 构建在Python字典的顶部，因此在对其进行迭代时不得更改大小。对于 WeakKeyDictionary 来说，这可能很难确保，因为程序在迭代过程中执行的操作可能会导致字典中的项目“因魔术而消失”（作为垃圾回收的副作用）。

trans-unit.source: Caution: Because a WeakValueDictionary is built on top of a Python dictionary, it must not change size when iterating over it. This can be difficult to ensure for a WeakValueDictionary because actions performed by the program during iteration may cause items in the dictionary to vanish “by magic” (as a side effect of garbage collection).
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于 WeakValueDictionary 构建在Python字典的顶部，因此在对其进行迭代时不得更改大小。对于 WeakValueDictionary 来说，这可能很难确保，因为程序在迭代过程中执行的操作可能会导致字典中的项目“因魔术而消失”（作为垃圾回收的副作用）。

trans-unit.source: Certificates in general are part of a public-key / private-key system. In this system, each principal, (which may be a machine, or a person, or an organization) is assigned a unique two-part encryption key. One part of the key is public, and is called the public key; the other part is kept secret, and is called the private key. The two parts are related, in that if you encrypt a message with one of the parts, you can decrypt it with the other part, and only with the other part.
trans-unit.target: 证书通常是公钥/私钥系统的一部分。在此系统中，每个主体（可能是一台机器，一个人或一个组织）都分配有一个唯一的两部分式加密密钥。密钥的一部分是公用的，称为公用密钥；另一部分被保密，称为私钥。这两个部分是相关的，如果您用其中一个部分对消息进行加密，则可以使用另一部分（也只能使用另一部分）对消息进行解密。

trans-unit.source: Change the current working directory to the directory represented by the file descriptor fd. The descriptor must refer to an opened directory, not an open file. As of Python 3.3, this is equivalent to os.chdir(fd).
trans-unit.target: 将当前工作目录更改为文件描述符fd表示的目录。描述符必须引用打开的目录，而不是打开的文件。从Python 3.3开始，这等效于 os.chdir(fd) 。

trans-unit.source: Change the definition of a color, taking the number of the color to be changed followed by three RGB values (for the amounts of red, green, and blue components). The value of color_number must be between 0 and COLORS. Each of r, g, b, must be a value between 0 and 1000. When init_color() is used, all occurrences of that color on the screen immediately change to the new definition. This function is a no-op on most terminals; it is active only if can_change_color() returns True.
trans-unit.target: 更改颜色的定义，采用要更改的颜色编号，后跟三个RGB值（用于红色，绿色和蓝色分量的数量）。color_number的值必须在 0 到 COLORS 之间。r，g，b的每个值必须在 0 到 1000 之间。使用 init_color() 时，屏幕上该颜色的所有出现都会立即更改为新的定义。在大多数终端上，此功能是无操作的；仅当 can_change_color() 返回 True 时,它才处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Change the definition of a color-pair. It takes three arguments: the number of the color-pair to be changed, the foreground color number, and the background color number. The value of pair_number must be between 1 and COLOR_PAIRS - 1 (the 0 color pair is wired to white on black and cannot be changed). The value of fg and bg arguments must be between 0 and COLORS. If the color-pair was previously initialized, the screen is refreshed and all occurrences of that color-pair are changed to the new definition.
trans-unit.target: 更改颜色对的定义。它包含三个参数：要更改的颜色对的编号，前景色号和背景色号。pair_number的值必须在 1 到 COLOR_PAIRS - 1 （ 0 颜色对连线为黑底白字，不能更改）。fg和bg参数的值必须在 0 到 COLORS 之间。如果颜色对先前已初始化，则刷新屏幕，并将所有出现的颜色对更改为新的定义。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.1: In 3.1 this was changed to add the test name to the short description even in the presence of a docstring. This caused compatibility issues with unittest extensions and adding the test name was moved to the TextTestResult in Python 3.2.

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.1: On some systems, conversion using the file system encoding may fail. In this case, Python uses the surrogateescape encoding error handler, which means that undecodable bytes are replaced by a Unicode character U+DCxx on decoding, and these are again translated to the original byte on encoding.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.1中进行了更改：在某些系统上，使用文件系统编码的转换可能会失败。在这种情况下，Python使用surrogateescape编码错误处理程序，这意味着无法解码的字节在解码时将被Unicode字符U + DCxx替换，并在编码时再次将其转换为原始字节。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.1: Previously, some of the integer formats wrapped out-of-range values and raised DeprecationWarning instead of struct.error.

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.1: The Python GIL is released to allow other threads to run while hash updates on data larger than 2047 bytes is taking place when using hash algorithms supplied by OpenSSL.
trans-unit.target: 3.1版本的变化:发布了Python GIL,当使用OpenSSL提供的哈希算法时,允许其他线程在对大于2047字节的数据进行哈希更新时运行。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.1: The default dict_type is collections.OrderedDict.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.1中更改：默认dict_type是 collections.OrderedDict 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.1: The positional argument specifiers can be omitted for str.format(), so '{} {}'.format(a, b) is equivalent to '{0} {1}'.format(a, b).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.1中进行了更改： str.format() 可以省略位置参数说明符，因此 '{} {}'.format(a, b) 等效于 '{0} {1}'.format(a, b) 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2.1: (See: bpo-12168.) In earlier versions, the message sent to the syslog daemons was always terminated with a NUL byte, because early versions of these daemons expected a NUL terminated message - even though it’s not in the relevant specification (RFC 5424). More recent versions of these daemons don’t expect the NUL byte but strip it off if it’s there, and even more recent daemons (which adhere more closely to RFC 5424) pass the NUL byte on as part of the message.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2.1中进行了更改：（请参阅：bpo-12168。）在早期版本中，发送到syslog守护程序的消息始终以NUL字节终止，因为这些守护程序的早期版本期望以NUL终止的消息-即使它不是在相关规范（RFC 5424）中。这些守护程序的最新版本不希望使用NUL字节，而是将其剥离（如果存在），甚至更新的守护程序（更紧密地遵循RFC 5424）将NUL字节作为消息的一部分传递。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: readfp() now iterates on fp instead of calling fp.readline().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改： readfp() 现在在fp上进行迭代，而不是调用 fp.readline() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: IGNORE_EXCEPTION_DETAIL now also ignores any information relating to the module containing the exception under test.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改： IGNORE_EXCEPTION_DETAIL 现在也忽略了与包含被测异常的模块有关的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: randrange() is more sophisticated about producing equally distributed values. Formerly it used a style like int(random()*n) which could produce slightly uneven distributions.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改： randrange() 在产生均等分布的值方面更为复杂。以前，它使用了类似 int(random()*n) 的样式，该样式可能会产生稍微不均匀的分布。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: getfilesystemencoding() result cannot be None anymore.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改： getfilesystemencoding() 结果不能再为 None 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: TestCase can be instantiated successfully without providing a methodName. This makes it easier to experiment with TestCase from the interactive interpreter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：无需提供methodName即可成功实例化 TestCase 。这使得从交互式解释器尝试 TestCase 更加容易。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: assertAlmostEqual() automatically considers almost equal objects that compare equal. assertNotAlmostEqual() automatically fails if the objects compare equal. Added the delta keyword argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改： assertAlmostEqual() 自动考虑比较相等的几乎相等的对象。如果对象比较相等，则 assertNotAlmostEqual() 自动失败。添加了delta关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: assertMultiLineEqual() added as the default type equality function for comparing strings.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改： assertMultiLineEqual() 被添加为用于比较字符串的默认类型相等函数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: DeprecationWarning is now ignored by default in addition to PendingDeprecationWarning.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：除 PendingDeprecationWarning 之外，默认情况下现在还将忽略 DeprecationWarning 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: .pdbrc can now contain commands that continue debugging, such as continue or next. Previously, these commands had no effect.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改： .pdbrc 现在可以包含继续调试的命令，例如 continue 或 next 。以前，这些命令无效。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: \v and \f added to list of line boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：将 \v 和 \f 添加到行边界列表中。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: get() and setdefault() are now available in all database modules.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改： get() 和 setdefault() 现在在所有数据库模块中可用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: allow_no_value, delimiters, comment_prefixes, strict, empty_lines_in_values, default_section and interpolation were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了allow_no_value，定界符，comment_prefixes，strict，empty_lines_in_values，default_section和插值。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: cafile and capath were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了cafile和capath。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: context and check_hostname were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了context和check_hostname。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: context parameter added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了上下文参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: group_pattern was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了group_pattern。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: msg may be a byte string.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：msg可能是一个字节字符串。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: query supports bytes and string objects.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：查询支持字节和字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: rest parameter added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了rest参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: restore_signals was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了restore_signals。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: socktype was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了socktype。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: source_address was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了source_address。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: source_address, context and check_hostname were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了source_address，context和check_hostname。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: start_new_session was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了start_new_session。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: usenetrc is now False by default.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：usenetrc现在默认为 False 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: A non-integral input to this method is rounded to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版本中的变化:本方法的非积分输入被四舍五入到最接近的整数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Accept only bytestring or bytearray objects as input.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版的变化:只接受bytestring或bytearray对象作为输入。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Add encoding and errors parameters.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加编码和错误参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added __cached__ global variable (see PEP 3147).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了 __cached__ 全局变量（请参阅PEP 3147）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added quiet attribute for the new -q flag.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：为新的 -q 标志添加了 quiet 属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added quiet attribute for the new -q flag.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：为新的 -q 标志添加了 quiet 属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added IPv6 URL parsing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:增加了IPv6 URL解析功能。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added Windows support.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:增加了对Windows的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added context manager support.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:增加了对上下文管理器的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added handling for the 'unknown-8bit' charset.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了对 'unknown-8bit' 字符集的处理。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added support for '-'.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：增加了对 '-' 的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added support for Windows 6.0 (Vista) symbolic links.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:增加了对Windows 6.0(Vista)符号链接的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added support for Windows.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:增加了对Windows的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added support for re-encoding 8bit message bodies, and the linesep argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：增加了对重新编码 8bit 消息正文和linesep参数的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added support for thread.lock, threading.Lock, and code objects.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:增加了对thread.lock、threading.Lock和代码对象的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the -b option.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了 -b 选项。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the -i, -b and -h options.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了 -i ， -b 和 -h 选项。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the exception attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版中进行了更改：添加了 exception 属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the warnings argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了 warnings 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the copy_function argument to be able to provide a custom copy function. Added the ignore_dangling_symlinks argument to silent dangling symlinks errors when symlinks is false.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了copy_function参数以能够提供自定义复制功能。当symlinks为false 时，将ignore_dangling_symlinks参数添加到无提示的悬挂符号链接错误中。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the domain keyword.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了domain关键字。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the filter parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了filter参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the keyencoding parameter; previously, keys were always encoded in UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了keyencoding参数。以前，密钥始终以UTF-8编码。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the legacy and optimize parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了legacy和Optimize参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the linesep argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了linesep参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added the set_attrs parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了set_attrs参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Added use of the __index__() method for non-integers.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：对于非整数，增加了使用 __index__() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Allow giving an explicit line number.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版的变化:允许给出一个明确的行号。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Allow strings for indent in addition to integers.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：除了整数以外，还允许字符串缩进。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Allow the use of named arguments.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版的变化:允许使用命名参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Allowed use of Windows and Mac newlines. Also input in 'exec' mode does not have to end in a newline anymore. Added the optimize parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：允许使用Windows和Mac换行符。同样，以 'exec' 模式输入的内容不必再以换行符结尾。添加了optimize参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Also print the contents of the garbage list at interpreter shutdown, if it isn’t empty.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版中进行了更改：如果不为空，还应在解释器关闭时打印 garbage 清单的内容。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Also print the contents of the garbage list at interpreter shutdown, if it isn’t empty.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：如果不为空，还应在解释器关闭时打印 garbage 清单的内容。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Arguments raw, vars and fallback are keyword only to protect users from trying to use the third argument as the fallback fallback (especially when using the mapping protocol).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：参数raw，vars和fallback仅用作关键字，以保护用户避免尝试将第三个参数用作后备回退（尤其是在使用映射协议时）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Audio device objects also support the context management protocol, i.e. they can be used in a with statement.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：音频设备对象还支持上下文管理协议，即，可以在 with 语句中使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Audio device objects also support the context management protocol, i.e. they can be used in a with statement.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：音频设备对象还支持上下文管理协议，即，可以在 with 语句中使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Before 3.2, the errors argument was ignored; 'replace' was always used to encode, and 'ignore' to decode.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版中进行了更改：在3.2版之前，errors参数被忽略；总是使用 'replace' 进行编码，而使用 'ignore' 进行解码。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Can be used as a context manager.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:可以作为上下文管理器使用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Changed default value of cfile to be PEP 3147-compliant. Previous default was file + 'c' ('o' if optimization was enabled). Also added the optimize parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：将cfile的默认值更改为符合PEP 3147。先前的默认值为文件 + 'c' （如果启用了优化，则为 'o' ）。还添加了optimize参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Changed to a named tuple and added service_pack_minor, service_pack_major, suite_mask, and product_type.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：更改为命名的元组，并添加了service_pack_minor，service_pack_major，suite_mask和product_type。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Floor division and true division of a timedelta object by another timedelta object are now supported, as are remainder operations and the divmod() function. True division and multiplication of a timedelta object by a float object are now supported.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版本中更改：楼师和真司一的 timedelta 另一个对象 timedelta 对象现在都支持，因为是其余操作和 divmod() 函数。现在支持将 timedelta 对象与 float 对象进行真正的除法和乘法。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: HTTPS virtual hosts are now supported if possible (that is, if ssl.HAS_SNI is true).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：现在尽可能支持HTTPS虚拟主机（即 ssl.HAS_SNI 为true）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Headers are stored in an internal buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版本中改变了:头文件被存储在一个内部缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: If this list is non-empty at interpreter shutdown, a ResourceWarning is emitted, which is silent by default. If DEBUG_UNCOLLECTABLE is set, in addition all uncollectable objects are printed.
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.2版本：如果这个名单是在非空解释关机，一个 ResourceWarning 发射，这是默认的沉默。如果设置了 DEBUG_UNCOLLECTABLE ,则还将打印所有无法收集的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: If this list is non-empty at interpreter shutdown, a ResourceWarning is emitted, which is silent by default. If DEBUG_UNCOLLECTABLE is set, in addition all uncollectable objects are printed.
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.2版本：如果这个名单是在非空解释关机，一个 ResourceWarning 发射，这是默认的沉默。如果设置了 DEBUG_UNCOLLECTABLE ,则还将打印所有无法收集的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Implement the Sequence ABC. Support slicing and negative indices. Test int objects for membership in constant time instead of iterating through all items.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：实现序列ABC。支持切片和负索引。在固定时间内测试 int 对象的成员资格，而不是遍历所有项目。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: In earlier versions it was only possible to run individual test methods and not modules or classes.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:在早期版本中,只能运行单个测试方法,而不能运行模块或类。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: In earlier versions the TestSuite accessed tests directly rather than through iteration, so overriding __iter__() wasn’t sufficient for providing tests.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：在早期版本中， TestSuite 直接访问测试，而不是通过迭代访问测试，因此，覆盖 __iter__() 不足以提供测试。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: In previous versions of configparser behaviour matched comment_prefixes=('#',';') and inline_comment_prefixes=(';',).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：在以前的 configparser 版本中，行为与 comment_prefixes=('#',';') 和 inline_comment_prefixes=(';',) 相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: In previous versions of configparser behaviour matched strict=False.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：在以前的 configparser 版本中，行为匹配 strict=False 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: In previous versions, strftime() method was restricted to years >= 1900.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：在以前的版本中， strftime() 方法仅限于> = 1900的年份。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: In previous versions, keyword arguments were not allowed, and ident was required. The default for ident was dependent on the system libraries, and often was python instead of the name of the Python program file.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：在以前的版本中，不允许使用关键字参数，并且需要ident。ident的默认值取决于系统库，通常是 python 而不是Python程序文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Lock acquires can now be interrupted by signals on POSIX.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版的变化:锁的获取现在可以被POSIX上的信号打断。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Lock acquisition can now be interrupted by signals on POSIX if the underlying threading implementation supports it.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:如果底层线程实现支持,锁的获取现在可以被POSIX上的信号打断。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Many of the following methods have been reworked and fixed, which makes them incompatible with their 3.1 counterparts.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版本中的变化:以下许多方法已被重新设计和修正,这使得它们与3.1版本的对应方法不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Missing attributes no longer trigger an AttributeError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：缺少属性不再触发 AttributeError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Mixed-type comparisons between Decimal instances and other numeric types are now fully supported.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：现在完全支持 Decimal 实例与其他数字类型之间的混合类型比较。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Mixer objects also support the context management protocol.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:混合器对象也支持上下文管理协议。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Moved to the version 2 scheme which uses all of the bits in a string seed.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版本中的变化:移到了2版本的方案,该方案使用了字符串种子中的所有位。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: NetBSD and DragonFlyBSD support added.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版本中进行了修改:增加了对NetBSD和DragonFlyBSD的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: New optional arguments filters and quiet.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：新的可选参数filter和quiet。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Non-string section names raise TypeError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：非字符串节名称引发 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Now allows bytes and set literals.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版本中的变化:现在允许使用字节和集合字元。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: On Unix, keys and values are bytes.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版的变化:在Unix上,键和值是字节。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Previously, Windows registry settings were ignored.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:以前,Windows注册表设置被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Previously, the method always returned None.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：以前，该方法始终返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Query parameter supports bytes and string objects.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版本中有所改变。查询参数支持字节和字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Renamed to assertRaisesRegex().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：重命名为 assertRaisesRegex() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Result is a structured object rather than a simple 2-tuple.
trans-unit.target: 在3.2版本中改变了:结果是一个结构化的对象,而不是一个简单的2-tuple。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Support for load_tests added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了对 load_tests 的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Support for binary input was added.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版的变化:增加了对二进制输入的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Support for the context manager protocol was added. Exiting the context manager is equivalent to calling close().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了对上下文管理器协议的支持。退出上下文管理器等效于调用 close() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Support for the with statement was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了对 with 语句的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Support for the context manager protocol was added. Exiting the context manager is equivalent to calling close().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了对上下文管理器协议的支持。退出上下文管理器等效于调用 close() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Support for the with statement was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：添加了对 with 语句的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Support for zero-padded and unseekable files was added.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版的变化:增加了对零填充和不可寻的文件的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The Fraction constructor now accepts float and decimal.Decimal instances.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改： Fraction 构造函数现在接受 float 和 decimal.Decimal 实例。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The isEnabledFor(), getEffectiveLevel(), setLevel() and hasHandlers() methods were added to LoggerAdapter. These methods delegate to the underlying logger.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改： isEnabledFor() ， getEffectiveLevel() ， setLevel() 和 hasHandlers() 方法已添加到 LoggerAdapter 。这些方法委托给基础记录器。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The ST_RDONLY and ST_NOSUID constants were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了 ST_RDONLY 和 ST_NOSUID 常量。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The StreamHandler class now has a terminator attribute, default value '\n', which is used as the terminator when writing a formatted record to a stream. If you don’t want this newline termination, you can set the handler instance’s terminator attribute to the empty string. In earlier versions, the terminator was hardcoded as '\n'.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改： StreamHandler 类现在具有 terminator 属性，默认值为 '\n' ，当将格式化的记录写入流时，该属性用作终止符。如果您不希望此换行符终止，则可以将处理程序实例的 terminator 属性设置为空字符串。在早期版本中，终止符被硬编码为 '\n' 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The filename attribute and __init__() argument were renamed to source for consistency.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：为保持一致性， filename 属性和 __init__() 参数已重命名为 source 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The filename attribute and __init__() argument were renamed to source for consistency.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：为保持一致性， filename 属性和 __init__() 参数已重命名为 source 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The compress_type argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：compress_type参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The level parameter now accepts a string representation of the level such as ‘INFO’ as an alternative to the integer constants such as INFO.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：现在，level参数接受级别的字符串表示形式，例如'INFO'，以替代整数常量（例如 INFO )。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The level parameter now accepts a string representation of the level such as ‘INFO’ as an alternative to the integer constants such as INFO. Note, however, that levels are internally stored as integers, and methods such as e.g. getEffectiveLevel() and isEnabledFor() will return/expect to be passed integers.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：现在，level参数接受级别的字符串表示形式，例如'INFO'，以替代整数常量（例如 INFO )。但是请注意，级别在内部存储为整数，并且诸如 getEffectiveLevel() 和 isEnabledFor() 之类的方法将返回/期望传递整数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The pass_fds parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了pass_fds参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The path parameter became optional.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：path参数变为可选。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The stack_info parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了stack_info参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The style argument was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了style参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The style parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：添加了样式参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The timeout parameter is new.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：超时参数是新的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The verbosity, failfast, catchbreak, buffer and warnings parameters were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2改变：该冗长，FAILFAST，catchbreak，缓冲液和警告加入参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The argument to the constructor is now permitted to be a float instance.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：现在允许构造函数的参数为 float 实例。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The buffered headers are written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:缓冲头被写入输出流。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The creation of a LogRecord has been made more configurable by providing a factory which is used to create the record. The factory can be set using getLogRecordFactory() and setLogRecordFactory() (see this for the factory’s signature).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：通过提供用于创建记录的工厂，使 LogRecord 的创建更加可配置。可以使用 getLogRecordFactory() 和 setLogRecordFactory() 设置工厂（有关工厂的签名，请参见此）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The default for close_fds was changed from False to what is described above.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：close_fds的默认值已从 False 更改为上述内容。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The default stream is set to sys.stderr at instantiation time rather than import time.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：在实例化时间而不是导入时间，默认流设置为 sys.stderr 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The file object really is a binary file; previously it was incorrectly returned in text mode. Also, the file-like object now supports the context management protocol: you can use a with statement to automatically close it.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：文件对象确实是一个二进制文件。以前在文本模式下错误地返回了它。而且，类似文件的对象现在支持上下文管理协议：您可以使用 with 语句自动将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The file object really is a binary file; previously it was incorrectly returned in text mode. Also, the file-like object now supports the context management protocol: you can use a with statement to automatically close it.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：文件对象实际上是一个二进制文件。以前在文本模式下错误地返回了它。而且，类似文件的对象现在支持上下文管理协议：您可以使用 with 语句自动将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The method assertRegexpMatches() has been renamed to assertRegex().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：方法 assertRegexpMatches() 已重命名为 assertRegex() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The returned dictionary includes additional items such as issuer and notBefore.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：返回的字典包含其他项，例如 issuer 和 notBefore 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: The returned socket objects now support the whole socket API, rather than a subset.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:返回的socket对象现在支持整个socket API,而不是一个子集。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: This class now supports HTTPS virtual hosts if possible (that is, if ssl.HAS_SNI is true).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：此类现在尽可能支持HTTPS虚拟主机（即 ssl.HAS_SNI 为true）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: This method is applicable only for local hostnames. When a remote hostname is given, an URLError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：此方法仅适用于本地主机名。给定远程主机名时，将引发 URLError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: URL parsing functions now accept ASCII encoded byte sequences
trans-unit.target: 3.2版的变化:URL解析函数现在接受ASCII编码的字节序列。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Use 'backslashreplace' error handler on UnicodeEncodeError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：在 UnicodeEncodeError 上使用 'backslashreplace' 错误处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Use 'surrogateescape' as the default for the errors argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中更改：使用 'surrogateescape' 作为errors参数的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Use of ContextDecorator.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：使用 ContextDecorator 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: Use of the __index__() method for non-integers is new in 3.2.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：3.2中新增了对非整数使用 __index__() 方法的功能。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: When the %z directive is provided to the strptime() method, an aware datetime object will be produced. The tzinfo of the result will be set to a timezone instance.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：将 %z 指令提供给 strptime() 方法时，将生成一个已知的 datetime 对象。结果的 tzinfo 将设置为时 timezone 实例。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: You don’t need to create specialized Filter classes, or use other classes with a filter method: you can use a function (or other callable) as a filter. The filtering logic will check to see if the filter object has a filter attribute: if it does, it’s assumed to be a Filter and its filter() method is called. Otherwise, it’s assumed to be a callable and called with the record as the single parameter. The returned value should conform to that returned by filter().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.2中进行了更改：不需要创建专门的 Filter 类，也不需要将其他类与 filter 方法一起使用：可以将函数（或其他可调用）用作过滤器。过滤逻辑将检查过滤器对象是否具有 filter 属性：如果有，则假定它是一个 Filter 并调用其 filter() 方法。否则，假定它是可调用的，并且以记录作为单个参数进行调用。返回的值应与 filter() 返回的值一致。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.2: parameters can now be passed using keyword arguments.
trans-unit.target: 3.2版本的变化:现在可以使用关键字参数传递参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3.1: bufsize now defaults to -1 to enable buffering by default to match the behavior that most code expects. In versions prior to Python 3.2.4 and 3.3.1 it incorrectly defaulted to 0 which was unbuffered and allowed short reads. This was unintentional and did not match the behavior of Python 2 as most code expected.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3.1版中进行了更改：bufsize现在默认为-1，以默认情况下启用缓冲以匹配大多数代码期望的行为。在Python 3.2.4和3.3.1之前的版本中，它错误地默认为 0 ，这是未缓冲的并且允许短读取。这是无意的，并且与大多数代码所期望的不匹配Python 2的行为。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3.3: The function now follows RFC 6125, section 6.4.3 and does neither match multiple wildcards (e.g. *.*.com or *a*.example.org) nor a wildcard inside an internationalized domain names (IDN) fragment. IDN A-labels such as www*.xn--pthon-kva.org are still supported, but x*.python.org no longer matches xn--tda.python.org.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3.3中进行了更改：该功能现在遵循RFC 6125第6.4.3节，并且既不匹配多个通配符（例如 *.*.com 或 *a*.example.org ），也不匹配国际化域名（IDN）中的通配符）片段。仍支持IDN A标签，例如 www*.xn--pthon-kva.org ，但 x*.python.org 不再与 xn--tda.python.org 匹配。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3.4: Windows support added
trans-unit.target: 在3.3.4版本中有所改变。增加了对Windows的支持

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3.4: Windows support was added.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3.4版本中有所改变。增加了对Windows的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3:
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: (See: bpo-12419.) In earlier versions, there was no facility for an “ident” or “tag” prefix to identify the source of the message. This can now be specified using a class-level attribute, defaulting to "" to preserve existing behaviour, but which can be overridden on a SysLogHandler instance in order for that instance to prepend the ident to every message handled. Note that the provided ident must be text, not bytes, and is prepended to the message exactly as is.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版中进行了更改：（请参阅：bpo-12419。）在较早的版本中，没有用于“ ident”或“ tag”前缀的功能来标识消息的来源。现在，可以使用类级别的属性来指定此属性，默认为 "" 以保留现有的行为，但是可以在 SysLogHandler 实例上覆盖该属性，以使该实例在所有处理的消息之前添加ident。请注意，提供的标识符必须是文本，而不是字节，并且完全照原样添加到消息中。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: EnvironmentError, IOError, WindowsError, socket.error, select.error and mmap.error have been merged into OSError, and the constructor may return a subclass.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改： EnvironmentError ， IOError ， WindowsError ， socket.error ， select.error 和 mmap.error 已合并到 OSError 中，并且构造函数可能返回子类。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: tolist() now supports all single character native formats in struct module syntax as well as multi-dimensional representations.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改： tolist() 现在支持 struct 模块语法中的所有单字符本机格式以及多维表示。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: scheduler class can be safely used in multi-threaded environments.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改： scheduler 类可以在多线程环境中安全使用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: SSLError used to be a subtype of socket.error.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改： SSLError 过去是 socket.error 的子类型。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Request.method argument is added to the Request class.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：将 Request.method 参数添加到Request类。

trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：曾经 IOError 而不是 OSError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: IOError used to be raised; it is now an alias of OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：曾经 IOError ；现在它是 OSError 的别名。

trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改： IOError OSError 而不是IOError，现在是IOError的别名。

trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：添加了cadefault。

trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3 中进行了更改：添加了上下文。

trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：请求对象需要 origin_req_host 属性。已删除对不赞成使用的方法 get_origin_req_host() 的依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: timeout was added.

trans-unit.target: 3.3版本的变化:现代界面的解码功能现在只接受ASCII的Unicode字符串。

trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改： a2b_* 函数现在接受仅ASCII的unicode字符串。

trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：除salt字符串外，还接受 crypt.METHOD_* 值。
