trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Added value attribute and the ability for generator functions to use it to return a value.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了 value 属性，并且生成器函数可以使用它返回值。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Added follow_symlinks argument and support for Linux extended attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了follow_symlinks参数并支持Linux扩展属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Added follow_symlinks argument, try to copy extended file system attributes too (currently Linux only). Now returns path to the newly created file.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了follow_symlinks参数，也尝试复制扩展文件系统属性（当前仅适用于Linux）。现在返回新创建文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Added follow_symlinks argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：添加了follow_symlinks参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Added follow_symlinks argument. Now returns path to the newly created file.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了follow_symlinks参数。现在返回新创建文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Added a symlink attack resistant version that is used automatically if platform supports fd-based functions.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版本的变化:增加了一个抗符号链接攻击的版本,如果平台支持基于fd的功能,会自动使用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Added explicit symlink handling for foreign filesystems, thus adapting it to the behavior of GNU’s mv. Now returns dst.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：为外部文件系统添加了显式符号链接处理，从而使其适应GNU的mv的行为。现在返回dst。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Added support for bzip2 and lzma compression.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了对 bzip2 和 lzma 压缩的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Argument can be omitted or None.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：可以忽略参数或 None 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Before PEP 393, sys.maxunicode used to be either 0xFFFF or 0x10FFFF, depending on the configuration option that specified whether Unicode characters were stored as UCS-2 or UCS-4.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：在PEP 393之前， sys.maxunicode 以前为 0xFFFF 或 0x10FFFF ，具体取决于指定将Unicode字符存储为UCS-2还是UCS-4的配置选项。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Before PEP 393, sys.maxunicode used to be either 0xFFFF or 0x10FFFF, depending on the configuration option that specified whether Unicode characters were stored as UCS-2 or UCS-4.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：在PEP 393之前， sys.maxunicode 曾经是 0xFFFF 或 0x10FFFF ，具体取决于指定将Unicode字符存储为UCS-2还是UCS-4的配置选项。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Connection objects themselves can now be transferred between processes using Connection.send() and Connection.recv().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：现在可以使用 Connection.send() 和 Connection.recv() 在进程之间传输连接对象本身。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Copy metadata when symlinks is false. Now returns dst.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：符号链接为false 时复制元数据。现在返回dst。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Define ‘==’ and ‘!=’ to compare range objects based on the sequence of values they define (instead of comparing based on object identity).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：定义'=='和'！='以根据它们定义的值序列比较范围对象（而不是根据对象标识进行比较）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Equality comparisons between aware and naive datetime instances don’t raise TypeError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：有意识的 datetime 实例和朴素的日期时间实例之间的相等比较不会引发 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Equality comparisons between aware and naive time instances don’t raise TypeError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：感知 time 实例与幼稚时间实例之间的相等比较不会引发 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Following PEP 3151, this class was made an alias of OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：在PEP 3151之后，该类已成为 OSError 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Following PEP 3151, this class was made an alias of OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：在PEP 3151之后，该类已成为 OSError 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: For backwards compatibility with the Python 2 series, the u prefix is once again permitted on string literals. It has no effect on the meaning of string literals and cannot be combined with the r prefix.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：为了与Python 2系列向后兼容，再次在字符串文字上允许使用 u 前缀。它对字符串文字的含义没有影响，并且不能与 r 前缀结合使用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Headers are stored to an internal buffer and end_headers() needs to be called explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：标头存储在内部缓冲区中，并且需要显式调用 end_headers() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Importing the module used to trigger paths manipulation even when using -S.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：即使使用 -S ,也导入用于触发路径操纵的模块。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Importing the module used to trigger paths manipulation even when using -S.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：即使使用 -S ,也导入用于触发路径操纵的模块。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: In version 3.2, strftime() method was restricted to years >= 1000.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：在版本3.2中， strftime() 方法仅限于> = 1000的年份。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: LoadError was made a subclass of OSError instead of IOError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：LoadError成为 OSError 而不是 IOError 的子类。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Manager objects support the context management protocol – see Context Manager Types. __enter__() starts the server process (if it has not already started) and then returns the manager object. __exit__() calls shutdown().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：Manager对象支持上下文管理协议–请参阅Context Manager Types。 __enter__() 启动服务器进程（如果尚未启动），然后返回管理器对象。 __exit__() 调用 shutdown() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Negative values for level are no longer supported (which also changes the default value to 0).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：级别的负值不再受支持（这还将默认值更改为0）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: New optional argument password.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：新的可选参数password。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: On Linux, sys.platform doesn’t contain the major version anymore. It is always 'linux', instead of 'linux2' or 'linux3'. Since older Python versions include the version number, it is recommended to always use the startswith idiom presented above.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：在Linux上， sys.platform 不再包含主要版本。它始终是 'linux' ，而不是 'linux2' 或 'linux3' 。由于较旧的Python版本包含版本号，因此建议始终使用上面介绍的 startswith 惯用语。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: One-dimensional memoryviews can now be sliced. One-dimensional memoryviews with formats ‘B’, ‘b’ or ‘c’ are now hashable.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：现在可以切片一维内存视图。格式为“ B”，“ b”或“ c”的一维内存视图现在可哈希化。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Operations in this module now raise OSError where IOError was raised.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：此模块中的操作现在在 IOError 地方引发 OSError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Operations in this module used to raise an IOError where they now raise an OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：此模块中的操作以前会 IOError ，而现在会引发 OSError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Operations that used to raise IOError now raise OSError, since IOError is now an alias of OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：用于引发 IOError 的操作现在引发 OSError ，因为 IOError 现在是 OSError 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Parent packages are automatically imported.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版本的变化:自动导入父包。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Previous versions compared the raw memory disregarding the item format and the logical array structure.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版本的变化:以前的版本比较原始内存,不考虑项目格式和逻辑数组结构。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Previous versions of run did not return the result. Neither did calling an instance.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：早期版本的 run 未返回结果。都没有调用实例。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Previously, AF_UNIX socket paths were assumed to use UTF-8 encoding.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：以前，假定 AF_UNIX 套接字路径使用UTF-8编码。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Previously, a name lookup was performed. To avoid name resolution delays, it now always returns the IP address.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版本的变化:以前是进行名称查找。为了避免名称解析延迟,现在总是返回IP地址。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Previously, the default format was hard-coded as in this example: 2010-09-06 22:38:15,292 where the part before the comma is handled by a strptime format string ('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), and the part after the comma is a millisecond value. Because strptime does not have a format placeholder for milliseconds, the millisecond value is appended using another format string, '%s,%03d' — and both of these format strings have been hardcoded into this method. With the change, these strings are defined as class-level attributes which can be overridden at the instance level when desired. The names of the attributes are default_time_format (for the strptime format string) and default_msec_format (for appending the millisecond value).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：以前，默认格式是硬编码的，例如以下示例： 2010-09-06 22:38:15,292 ，其中逗号前的部分由strptime格式字符串（ '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S' ），逗号后的部分是毫秒值。因为strptime在几毫秒内没有格式占位符，所以使用另一个格式字符串 '%s,%03d' 附加了毫秒值-这两个格式字符串都已硬编码到此方法中。通过更改，这些字符串被定义为类级别的属性，可以在需要时在实例级别覆盖它们。属性的名称是 default_time_format （用于strptime格式字符串）和 default_msec_format （用于附加毫秒值）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Raise OverflowError instead of ValueError if the timestamp is out of the range of values supported by the platform C gmtime() function. Raise OSError instead of ValueError on gmtime() failure.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：如果时间戳超出平台C gmtime() 函数支持的值范围，则 ValueError OverflowError 而不是ValueError。提高 OSError 而不是 ValueError 异常对 gmtime() 失败。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Raise OverflowError instead of ValueError if the timestamp is out of the range of values supported by the platform C localtime() function. Raise OSError instead of ValueError on localtime() failure.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：如果时间戳超出平台C localtime() 函数支持的值范围，则 ValueError OverflowError 而不是ValueError。提高 OSError 而不是 ValueError 异常的 localtime() 失败。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Raise OverflowError instead of ValueError if the timestamp is out of the range of values supported by the platform C localtime() or gmtime() functions. Raise OSError instead of ValueError on localtime() or gmtime() failure.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：如果时间戳超出平台C localtime() 或 gmtime() 函数支持的值范围，则 ValueError OverflowError 而不是ValueError。提高 OSError 代替 ValueError 异常上 localtime() 或 gmtime() 失败。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Raise ValueError on unsupported Authentication Scheme.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：在不受支持的身份验证方案上 ValueError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Removed obsolete division_warning attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：删除了过时的 division_warning 属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Removed the strict argument that was deprecated in 2.4. Added the policy keyword.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：删除了2.4中不推荐使用的严格参数。添加了policy关键字。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Removed the strict argument. Added the policy keyword.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：删除了严格参数。添加了policy关键字。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Result changed from a tuple to a namedtuple.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版本中进行了修改。结果由元组改为命名元组。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Return an io.BufferedReader object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：返回 io.BufferedReader 对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Return type changed from a tuple to a tuple-like object with named attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版本中有所改变。返回类型从元组改为带有命名属性的类似元组的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Returns the registered subclass, to allow usage as a class decorator.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版本中有所改变。返回已注册的子类,允许作为类装饰器使用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: See above.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版中进行了更改：请参见上文。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Several functions in this module used to raise a WindowsError, which is now an alias of OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：此模块中的几个函数用于引发 WindowsError ，现在它是 OSError 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Support any error handler.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版本的变化:支持任何错误处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Support for multi-stream inputs was added.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版的变化:增加了对多流输入的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Support for name aliases 1 and named sequences 2 has been added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了对名称别名1和命名序列2的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Support for the with statement was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了对 with 语句的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Support for the with statement was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了对 with 语句的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Support was added for filename being a file object instead of an actual filename.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版本的改变：是为增加支持的文件名是一个文件对象，而不是一个实际的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Support was added for filename being a file object instead of an actual filename.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了对将文件名作为文件对象而不是实际文件名的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Tab-completion via the readline module is available for commands and command arguments, e.g. the current global and local names are offered as arguments of the p command.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：通过 readline 模块的制表符完成功能可用于命令和命令参数，例如，将当前全局名和本地名作为 p 命令的参数提供。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The struct_time type was extended to provide the tm_gmtoff and tm_zone attributes when platform supports corresponding struct tm members.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：扩展了 struct_time 类型，以在平台支持相应的 struct tm 成员时提供 tm_gmtoff 和 tm_zone 属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The io.BufferedIOBase.read1() method is now implemented.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：现在实现了 io.BufferedIOBase.read1() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The wait_for() method was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了 wait_for() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The '\u' and '\U' escape sequences have been added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：添加了 '\u' 和 '\U' 转义序列。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The '_' character is no longer escaped.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改： '_' 字符不再转义。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The 'a' (append) mode was added, along with support for reading multi-stream files.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：添加了 'a' （附加）模式，并支持读取多流文件。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The -g command line option was removed.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改： -g 命令行选项已删除。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The fileno(), readable(), seekable(), writable(), read1() and readinto() methods were added.
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.3版本：本 fileno() ， readable() ， seekable() ， writable() ， read1() 和 readinto() 中加入的方法。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The handlers argument was added. Additional checks were added to catch situations where incompatible arguments are specified (e.g. handlers together with stream or filename, or stream together with filename).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：添加了handlers参数。添加了附加检查，以捕获指定了不兼容参数的情况（例如，处理程序与stream或filename或stream与filename一起）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The opener parameter was added. The 'x' mode was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：添加了opener参数。所述 'x' 的溶液中加入模式。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The policy keyword argument was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：添加了policy关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The use_builtin_types flag was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：添加了use_builtin_types标志。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The write_through argument has been added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：已添加write_through参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The AF_CAN family was added. The AF_RDS family was added.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版的变化:增加了AF_CAN系列。增加了AF_RDS系列。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The C module computes power() in terms of the correctly-rounded exp() and ln() functions. The result is well-defined but only “almost always correctly-rounded”.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：C模块根据正确舍入的 exp() 和 ln() 函数计算 power() 。结果定义明确，但“几乎总是正确取整”。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The default encoding is now locale.getpreferredencoding(False) instead of locale.getpreferredencoding(). Don’t change temporary the locale encoding using locale.setlocale(), use the current locale encoding instead of the user preferred encoding.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：现在默认编码为 locale.getpreferredencoding(False) 而不是 locale.getpreferredencoding() 。不要使用 locale.setlocale() 临时更改语言环境编码，请使用当前的语言环境编码，而不要使用用户首选的编码。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The fragment is now parsed for all URL schemes (unless allow_fragment is false), in accordance with RFC 3986. Previously, a whitelist of schemes that support fragments existed.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：现在按照RFC 3986为所有URL方案分析了该片段（除非allow_fragment为false）。以前，存在支持片段的方案白名单。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The function is based directly on importlib.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：该函数直接基于 importlib 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: The term “Python” is replaced with implementation specific term like “CPython”, “Jython” etc.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：“ Python”一词已被实现特定的术语（如“ CPython”，“ Jython”等）替换。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: This class was made a subclass of OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：此类已成为 OSError 的子类。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: This function is now IPv6-compatible.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版中有所改变:该功能现在与IPv6兼容。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: This function used to be called unconditionally.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版本的变化:这个函数过去是无条件调用的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: This function used to raise IOError, which is now an alias of OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：此函数用于引发 IOError ，它现在是 OSError 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: This is now a synonym of the built-in RuntimeError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：现在，它是内置 RuntimeError 的同义词。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: This method used to raise socket.error, which is now an alias of OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：此方法用于引发 socket.error ，现在它是 OSError 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: This module will use a fast implementation whenever available.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版本的变化:该模块将在可用的情况下使用快速实现。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: This module will use a fast implementation whenever available. The xml.etree.cElementTree module is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：此模块将在可用时使用快速实现。该 xml.etree.cElementTree 模块已被弃用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Updated to be based directly on importlib rather than relying on the package internal PEP 302 import emulation.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：已更新为直接基于 importlib ,而不是依赖于程序包内部PEP 302导入仿真。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Updated to be based directly on importlib rather than relying on the package internal PEP 302 import emulation.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：已更新为直接基于 importlib ,而不是依赖于程序包内部PEP 302导入仿真。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Updated to be based directly on importlib rather than relying on the package internal PEP 302 import emulation.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：已更新为直接基于 importlib ,而不是依赖于程序包内部PEP 302导入仿真。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Updated to be based directly on importlib rather than relying on the package internal PEP 302 import emulation.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：已更新为直接基于 importlib ,而不是依赖于程序包内部PEP 302导入仿真。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Updated to be based directly on importlib rather than relying on the package internal PEP 302 import emulation.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：已更新为直接基于 importlib ,而不是依赖于程序包内部PEP 302导入仿真。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Updated to be based directly on importlib rather than relying on the package internal PEP 302 import emulation.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：已更新为直接基于 importlib ,而不是依赖于程序包内部PEP 302导入仿真。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: When universal_newlines is True, the class uses the encoding locale.getpreferredencoding(False) instead of locale.getpreferredencoding(). See the io.TextIOWrapper class for more information on this change.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：当universal_newlines为 True 时，该类使用编码 locale.getpreferredencoding(False) 代替 locale.getpreferredencoding() 。有关此更改的更多信息，请参见 io.TextIOWrapper 类。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: When one of the worker processes terminates abruptly, a BrokenProcessPool error is now raised. Previously, behaviour was undefined but operations on the executor or its futures would often freeze or deadlock.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：当一个辅助进程突然终止时，现在会出现 BrokenProcessPool 错误。以前，行为是不确定的，但是对执行器或其期货的操作通常会冻结或死锁。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: Windows errors used to raise WindowsError, which is now an alias of OSError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：Windows错误曾经引发 WindowsError ，它现在是 OSError 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: changed from a factory function to a class.
trans-unit.target: 3.3版本的变化:从工厂函数改为类。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: format 'B' is now handled according to the struct module syntax. This means that memoryview(b'abc')[0] == b'abc'[0] == 97.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：现在根据结构模块语法处理格式 'B' 。这意味着 memoryview(b'abc')[0] == b'abc'[0] == 97 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: get_method now looks at the value of Request.method.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中更改：get_method现在查看 Request.method 的值。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: source_address argument was added.
trans-unit.target: 在3.3版本中进行了修改:增加了source_address参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.3: the truncate method now accepts a size argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.3中进行了更改：truncate方法现在接受一个 size 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4.1: Before Python 3.4.1, if exist_ok was True and the directory existed, makedirs() would still raise an error if mode did not match the mode of the existing directory. Since this behavior was impossible to implement safely, it was removed in Python 3.4.1. See bpo-21082.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4.1中进行了更改：在Python 3.4.1之前，如果exist_ok为 True 且目录已存在，如果mode与现有目录的模式不匹配， makedirs() 仍会引发错误。由于无法安全实现此行为，因此在Python 3.4.1中将其删除。参见bpo-21082。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4.2: is_attachment is now a method instead of a property, for consistency with is_multipart().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4.2中更改：为了与 is_multipart() 保持一致，is_attachment现在是方法而不是属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4.3: context was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4.3中更改：添加了上下文。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4.3: This class now performs all the necessary certificate and hostname checks by default. To revert to the previous, unverified, behavior ssl._create_unverified_context() can be passed to the context parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4.3中更改：此类现在默认情况下执行所有必要的证书和主机名检查。要恢复为先前未验证的行为，可以将 ssl._create_unverified_context() 传递给context参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4.4: RC4 was dropped from the default cipher string.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4.4版本中有所改变。默认密码字符串中删除了RC4。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4.4: The family, proto, flags, reuse_address, reuse_port, *allow_broadcast, and sock parameters were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4.4中进行了更改：添加了family，proto，flags，复用地址，复用端口，* allow_broadcast和sock参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4:
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: pydoc now uses inspect.signature() rather than inspect.getfullargspec() to extract signature information from callables.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改： pydoc 现在使用 inspect.signature() 而不是 inspect.getfullargspec() 从可调用对象中提取签名信息。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: spawn() now returns the status value from os.waitpid() on the child process.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改： spawn() 现在在子进程上从 os.waitpid() 返回状态值。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: ValueError is raised when the handshake isn’t done. The returned dictionary includes additional X509v3 extension items such as crlDistributionPoints, caIssuers and OCSP URIs.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：未完成握手时引发 ValueError 。返回的字典包含其他X509v3扩展项，例如 crlDistributionPoints ， caIssuers 和 OCSP URI。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Module specs were introduced in Python 3.4, by PEP 451. Earlier versions of Python looked for a method called find_module(). This is still called as a fallback if a meta_path entry doesn’t have a find_spec() method.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：PEP 451在Python 3.4中引入了模块规范。早期版本的Python寻找一种名为 find_module() 的方法。如果 meta_path 条目没有 find_spec() 方法，则仍称为备用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Module specs were introduced in Python 3.4, by PEP 451. Earlier versions of Python looked for a method called find_module(). This is still called as a fallback if a meta_path entry doesn’t have a find_spec() method.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：PEP 451在Python 3.4中引入了模块规范。早期版本的Python寻找一种名为 find_module() 的方法。如果 meta_path 条目没有 find_spec() 方法，则仍称为备用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: object().__format__(format_spec) raises TypeError if format_spec is not an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：如果format_spec不是空字符串，则 object().__format__(format_spec) 引发 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: replace keyword was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了 replace 关键字。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: atTime parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：添加了atTime参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: convert_charrefs keyword argument added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：添加了convert_charrefs关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: spawn added on all unix platforms, and forkserver added for some unix platforms. Child processes no longer inherit all of the parents inheritable handles on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：在所有的unix平台上添加了spawn，并为某些unix平台添加了forkserver。子进程不再继承Windows上所有父级可继承句柄。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: A default value can now be set in subclasses; previously it could only be set via the constructor argument.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。现在可以在子类中设置默认值,以前只能通过构造函数参数设置。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Activation of rlcompleter and history was made automatic.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。rlcompleter和历史记录的激活是自动的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Add O_PATH on systems that support it. Add O_TMPFILE, only available on Linux Kernel 3.11 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：在支持它的系统上添加 O_PATH 。添加 O_TMPFILE ，仅在Linux Kernel 3.11或更高版本上可用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Add the optional inheritable parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：添加可选的可继承参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added readline() and readlines() support. The mock of read() changed to consume read_data rather than returning it on each call.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了 readline() 和 readlines() 支持。 read() 的模拟更改为使用read_data，而不是在每次调用时都返回它。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added isolated attribute for -Iisolated flag.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：为 -I isolated 标志添加了 isolated 属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added isolated attribute for -Iisolated flag.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：为 -I isolated 标志添加了 isolated 属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added algorithm, hash_bits and seed_bits
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了算法，hash_bits和seed_bits

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added file parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：添加了文件参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added Windows support.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。增加了对Windows的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added context manager support.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。增加了对上下文管理器的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added native support for the context management protocol to the objects returned by open().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：向 open() 返回的对象添加了对上下文管理协议的本机支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added signature introspection on specced and autospecced mock objects.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。增加了对规范化和自动规范化模拟对象的签名自省。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added support for data URLs.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。增加了对数据URL的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added support for int- and float-derived Enum classes.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。增加了对int-和float-derived Enum类的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added support for the "x" and "xb" modes.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了对 "x" 和 "xb" 模式的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added support for the "x", "xb" and "xt" modes.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了对 "x" ， "xb" 和 "xt" 模式的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added support for the 'x' and 'xb' modes.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了对 'x' 和 'xb' 模式的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added support for the 'x', 'xb' and 'xt' modes.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了对 'x' ， 'xb' 和 'xt' 模式的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added support for unseekable files.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。增加了对不可寻的文件的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added the __callback__ attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了 __callback__ 属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added the with_pip parameter
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了 with_pip 参数

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added the compact parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了紧凑参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added the uri parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了uri参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Added the POSIX permission check.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。增加了POSIX权限检查。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: An instance of a subclass of RawConfigParser is now accepted as a value for fname. This facilitates:
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：现在接受 RawConfigParser 子类的实例作为 fname 的值。这有助于：

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Any bytes-like object is now accepted.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：现在接受任何类似字节的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Any bytes-like objects are now accepted by all encoding and decoding functions in this module. Ascii85/Base85 support added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：此模块中的所有编码和解码功能现在都接受任何类似字节的对象。添加了Ascii85 / Base85支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Any bytes-like object is now accepted.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：现在可以接受任何类似字节的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Any bytes-like objects are now accepted by all encoding and decoding functions in this module. Ascii85/Base85 support added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：此模块中的所有编码和解码功能现在都可以接受任何类似字节的对象。添加了Ascii85 / Base85支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Calls objects in sys.path_hooks with the current working directory for '' (i.e. the empty string).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：使用当前工作目录中的 '' （即空字符串）调用 sys.path_hooks 中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Changed code to use importlib for the byte-code cache file writing. This means file creation/writing semantics now match what importlib does, e.g. permissions, write-and-move semantics, etc. Also added the caveat that FileExistsError is raised if cfile is a symlink or non-regular file.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：更改了代码以使用 importlib 进行字节代码缓存文件写入。这意味着文件创建/写入语义现在与 importlib 的功能匹配，例如权限，写和移动语义等。还添加了警告，如果cfile是符号链接或非常规文件， FileExistsError 引发FileExistsError。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Changes to pydoc and inspect mean that the reported signatures for callables are now more comprehensive and consistent.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：对 pydoc 和 inspect 的更改意味着所报告的可调用签名已经更加全面和一致。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Changing value of Request.data now deletes “Content-Length” header if it was previously set or calculated.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：现在，更改 Request.data 的值会删除“ Content-Length”标头（如果先前已设置或计算）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Default Request.method may be indicated at the class level.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：默认 Request.method 可能在类级别上指示。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Defaults to None. Previously the attribute was optional.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：默认为 None 。以前，该属性是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Following PEP 442, objects with a __del__() method don’t end up in gc.garbage anymore.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：在PEP 442之后，具有 __del__() 方法的 gc.garbage 不再以gc.garbage结尾。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Following PEP 442, objects with a __del__() method don’t end up in gc.garbage anymore.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：在PEP 442之后，具有 __del__() 方法的 gc.garbage 不再以gc.garbage结尾。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Gained create_module() and exec_module() methods.
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.4版本：后获得了 create_module() 和 exec_module() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: If __loader__ is not set, raise ValueError, just like when the attribute is set to None.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：如果未设置 __loader__ ，则引发 ValueError ，就像将属性设置为 None 一样。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: If port is specified as None, a Unix domain socket is created using the value in host - otherwise, a TCP socket is created.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：如果将 port 指定为 None ，则使用 host 中的值创建一个Unix域套接字-否则，将创建一个TCP套接字。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: If port is specified as None, a Unix domain socket is created using the value in host - otherwise, a UDP socket is created.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：如果将 port 指定为 None ，则使用 host 中的值创建Unix域套接字-否则，将创建UDP套接字。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: If base is not an instance of int and the base object has a base.__index__ method, that method is called to obtain an integer for the base. Previous versions used base.__int__ instead of base.__index__.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：如果base不是 int 的实例，并且基础对象具有 base.__index__ 方法，则将调用该方法以获取base的整数。以前的版本使用 base.__int__ 而不是 base.__index__ 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: If base is not an instance of int and the base object has a base.__index__ method, that method is called to obtain an integer for the base. Previous versions used base.__int__ instead of base.__index__.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：如果base不是 int 的实例，并且基础对象具有 base.__index__ 方法，则将调用该方法以获取base的整数。以前的版本使用 base.__int__ 而不是 base.__index__ 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: In Python 3.3 Parameter objects were allowed to have name set to None if their kind was set to POSITIONAL_ONLY. This is no longer permitted.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：在Python 3.3中，如果参数对象的 kind 设置为 POSITIONAL_ONLY ,则其 name 将设置为 None 。不再允许这样做。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: In Python versions earlier than 3.4, this function could also be passed a text level, and would return the corresponding numeric value of the level. This undocumented behaviour was considered a mistake, and was removed in Python 3.4, but reinstated in 3.4.2 due to retain backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 在 3.4 版本中有所改变。在 Python 3.4 之前的版本中,这个函数也可以传递一个文本级别,并返回级别的相应数值。这种未被记录的行为被认为是一个错误,在 Python 3.4 中被删除了,但在 3.4.2 中由于保留了向后的兼容性而被恢复了。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: In earlier versions the TestSuite held references to each TestCase after TestSuite.run(). Subclasses can restore that behavior by overriding TestSuite._removeTestAtIndex().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：在早期版本中， TestSuite 在 TestSuite.run() 之后保留对每个 TestCase 的引用。子类可以通过重写 TestSuite._removeTestAtIndex() 来恢复该行为。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: In earlier versions, if the target directory already existed, an error was raised, unless the --clear or --upgrade option was provided.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本的改变：在早期版本中，如果目标目录已经存在，一个错误有人提出，除非 --clear 或 --upgrade 被提供的选项。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Installs pip by default, added the --without-pip and --copies options
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：默认情况下安装pip，添加了 --without-pip 和 --copies 选项

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Made optional instead of an abstractmethod.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中进行了修改。将抽象方法改为可选方法。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Modules that raise SkipTest on import are recorded as skips, not errors. Discovery works for namespace packages. Paths are sorted before being imported so that execution order is the same even if the underlying file system’s ordering is not dependent on file name.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：在导入时引发 SkipTest 的模块被记录为跳过，而不是错误。发现适用于名称空间包。在导入之前对路径进行排序，以便即使基础文件系统的顺序不取决于文件名，执行顺序也相同。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Modules that raise SkipTest on import are recorded as skips, not errors. Discovery works for namespace packages. Paths are sorted before being imported so that execution order is the same even if the underlying file system’s ordering is not dependent on file name.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：在导入时引发 SkipTest 的模块被记录为跳过，而不是错误。发现适用于名称空间包。在导入之前对路径进行排序，以便即使基础文件系统的顺序不依赖于文件名，执行顺序也相同。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: New API, old API deprecated. Support for binary format plists added.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。新的API,旧的API被废弃。增加了对二进制格式plists的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: New optional argument cadata
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：新的可选参数cadata

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: No longer abstract and a concrete implementation is provided.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。不再是抽象的,而是提供了具体的实施。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: No longer raises NotImplementedError when called.
trans-unit.target: 版本3.4中的更改：调用时不再引发 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Now supported on Unix when the 'spawn' start method is used.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：现在，当使用 'spawn' 启动方法时，在Unix上受支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Parameter key can be a bytes or bytearray object. Parameter msg can be of any type supported by hashlib. Parameter digestmod can be the name of a hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：参数键可以是字节或字节数组对象。参数msg可以是 hashlib 支持的任何类型。参数digestmod可以是哈希算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Parameter msg can be of any type supported by hashlib.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：参数msg可以是 hashlib 支持的任何类型。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Raise SameFileError instead of Error. Since the former is a subclass of the latter, this change is backward compatible.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：提高 SameFileError 而不是 Error 。由于前者是后者的子类，因此此更改是向后兼容的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Raise ImportError when called instead of NotImplementedError. Functionality provided when exec_module() is available.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：调用时 NotImplementedError ImportError 而不是NotImplementedError。提供的功能时 exec_module() 是可用的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Raise OSError instead of NotImplementedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：提高 OSError 而不是 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Raises ImportError instead of NotImplementedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：引发 ImportError 而不是 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Raises OSError instead of NotImplementedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：引发 OSError 而非 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Restoration of the rot13 alias.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：恢复 rot13 别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Restoration of the aliases for the binary transforms.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。恢复了二进制变换的别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Returning NotImplemented from the underlying comparison function for unrecognised types is now supported.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中做了修改,对于未识别的类型,支持从底层比较函数中返回NotImplemented。对于未识别的类型,现在支持从底层比较函数中返回NotImplemented。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Returns (None, []) instead of raising NotImplementedError. Uses find_spec() when available to provide functionality.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：返回 (None, []) 而不是引发 NotImplementedError 。在提供功能时使用 find_spec() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Returns False if there were any unexpectedSuccesses from tests marked with the expectedFailure() decorator.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：如果测试中标记有 expectedFailure() 装饰器的任何 unexpectedSuccesses ，则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Returns None when called instead of NotImplemented.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：调用时返回 None ，而不是 NotImplemented 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Returns None when called instead of raising NotImplementedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：调用时返回 None ，而不是引发 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Returns None when called instead of raising NotImplementedError. Can use find_spec() to provide functionality.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：调用时返回 None ，而不是引发 NotImplementedError 。可以使用 find_spec() 提供功能。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: SMTPException became subclass of OSError
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：SMTPException成为 OSError 的子类

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Set __name__, __loader____package__ unconditionally to support reloading.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：无条件设置 __name__ ， __loader__ __package__ 以支持重新加载。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Set __name__, __loader____package__ unconditionally to support reloading.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：无条件设置 __name__ ， __loader__ __package__ 以支持重新加载。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Set __loader__ if set to None, as if the attribute does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：如果将 __loader__ 设置为 None ，则将该属性设置为不存在。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Support for 24-bit samples was added. All functions now accept any bytes-like object. String input now results in an immediate error.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了对24位样本的支持。现在，所有函数都可以接受任何类似字节的对象。现在，字符串输入会导致立即错误。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Support for 24-bit samples was added. All functions now accept any bytes-like object. String input now results in an immediate error.

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Support for the with statement was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了对 with 语句的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Support for the with statement was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了对 with 语句的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Support for the with statement was added. The new file descriptor is now non-inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了对 with 语句的支持。现在，新的文件描述符是不可继承的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Support for the input keyword argument was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：添加了对input关键字参数的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Test discovery supports namespace packages.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：测试发现支持名称空间包。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Test discovery supports namespace packages.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：测试发现支持名称空间包。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The filename attribute is now the original file name passed to the function, instead of the name encoded to or decoded from the filesystem encoding. Also, the filename2 constructor argument and attribute was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改： filename 属性现在是传递给函数的原始文件名，而不是编码到文件系统编码或从文件系统编码解码的名称。另外，添加了filename2构造函数参数和属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The 'surrogatepass' error handlers now works with utf-16* and utf-32* codecs.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：现在， 'surrogatepass' 错误处理程序可与utf-16 *和utf-32 *编解码器一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The 'x' (exclusive creation) mode was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：添加了 'x' （专有创建）模式。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The ST_NODEV, ST_NOEXEC, ST_SYNCHRONOUS, ST_MANDLOCK, ST_WRITE, ST_APPEND, ST_IMMUTABLE, ST_NOATIME, ST_NODIRATIME, and ST_RELATIME constants were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：添加了 ST_NODEV ， ST_NOEXEC ， ST_SYNCHRONOUS ， ST_MANDLOCK ， ST_WRITE ， ST_APPEND ， ST_IMMUTABLE ， ST_NOATIME ， ST_NODIRATIME 和 ST_RELATIME 常量。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The __wrapped__ attribute now always refers to the wrapped function, even if that function defined a __wrapped__ attribute. (see bpo-17482)
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改： __wrapped__ 属性现在始终引用包装的函数，即使该函数定义了 __wrapped__ 属性也是如此。（请参阅bpo-17482）

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The file attribute is automatically closed upon the garbage collection of the creating FieldStorage instance.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：在创建 FieldStorage 实例的垃圾回收时， file 属性自动关闭。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The verify argument was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：添加了 verify 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The defaultTest parameter was changed to also accept an iterable of test names.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：defaultTest参数已更改为还接受可迭代的测试名称。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The strict parameter was removed. HTTP 0.9 style “Simple Responses” are no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：严格参数已删除。不再支持HTTP 0.9样式的“简单响应”。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The strict parameter was removed. HTTP 0.9-style “Simple Responses” are no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：严格参数已删除。不再支持HTTP 0.9样式的“简单响应”。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The strict parameter was removed. HTTP 0.9-style “Simple Responses” are not longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：严格参数已删除。不再支持HTTP 0.9样式的“简单响应”。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The CAN_BCM protocol was added.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。增加了CAN_BCM协议。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The class now supports hostname check with ssl.SSLContext.check_hostname and Server Name Indication (see ssl.HAS_SNI).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：该类现在支持使用 ssl.SSLContext.check_hostname 和服务器名称指示（请参阅 ssl.HAS_SNI ）进行主机名检查。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The error response includes a Content-Length header. Added the explain argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：错误响应包括一个Content-Length标头。添加了explain参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The file is now non-inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。该文件现在是不可继承的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The function supports S_IFDOOR, S_IFPORT and S_IFWHT.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：该函数支持 S_IFDOOR ， S_IFPORT 和 S_IFWHT 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The handshake method also performs match_hostname() when the check_hostname attribute of the socket’s context is true.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了 match_hostname() 当套接字 context 的 check_hostname 属性为true 时，握手方法还将执行match_hostname（）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The method now supports hostname check with ssl.SSLContext.check_hostname and Server Name Indication (see ssl.HAS_SNI).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：该方法现在支持使用 ssl.SSLContext.check_hostname 和服务器名称指示（请参阅 ssl.HAS_SNI ）进行主机名检查。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The method now supports hostname check with SSLContext.check_hostname and Server Name Indicator (see HAS_SNI).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：该方法现在支持使用 SSLContext.check_hostname 和Server Name Indicator进行主机名检查（请参阅 HAS_SNI ）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The name attribute has been present in CPython since its inception, but until Python 3.4 was not formally specified, so may not exist on some platforms.
trans-unit.target: 在 3.4 版本中有所改变。名字属性自CPython诞生以来就一直存在,但在Python 3.4之前并没有正式指定,因此在某些平台上可能不存在。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The new file descriptor is now non-inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版中有所改变。新的文件描述符现在是不可继承的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The new file descriptors are now non-inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版中有所改变。新的文件描述符现在是不可继承的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The optional m parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：添加了可选的 m 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The positional argument specifiers can be omitted for Formatter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改： Formatter 可以省略位置参数说明符。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The request methods add_data, has_data, get_data, get_type, get_host, get_selector, get_origin_req_host and is_unverifiable that were deprecated since 3.3 have been removed.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。删除了自3.3版以来被废弃的请求方法add_data、has_data、get_data、get_type、get_host、get_selector、get_origin_req_host和is_unverifiable。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The returned socket is now non-inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。返回的socket现在是不可继承的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The returned sockets are now non-inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。现在返回的套接字是不可继承的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The socket is now non-inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。套接字现在是不可继承的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The stat module is backed by a C implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。统计模块由C语言实现支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: The utf-16* and utf-32* encoders no longer allow surrogate code points (U+D800–U+DFFF) to be encoded. The utf-32* decoders no longer decode byte sequences that correspond to surrogate code points.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：utf-16 *和utf-32 *编码器不再允许代理代码点（ U+D800 – U+DFFF ）进行编码。utf-32 *解码器不再解码与代理代码点相对应的字节序列。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: This function is now based on signature(), but still ignores __wrapped__ attributes and includes the already bound first parameter in the signature output for bound methods.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：此函数现在基于 signature() ，但仍忽略 __wrapped__ 属性，并在绑定方法的签名输出中包含已经绑定的第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: To detect calls to register(), you can use the get_cache_token() function.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：要检测对 register() 的调用，可以使用 get_cache_token() 函数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: To suppress printing any banner, pass an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。要抑制打印任何横幅,需要传递一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Updated to be based on PEP 451
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：已更新为基于PEP 451

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Updated to be based on PEP 451
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：已更新为基于PEP 451

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Updated to take advantage of the module spec feature added by PEP 451. This allows __cached__ to be set correctly for modules run this way, as well as ensuring the real module name is always accessible as __spec__.name.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：更新以利用PEP 451添加的模块规范功能。这样就可 __cached__ 以这种方式运行的模块正确设置__cached__，并确保始终可以使用 __spec__.name 来访问真实的模块名称。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Updated to take advantage of the module spec feature added by PEP 451. This allows __cached__ to be set correctly in the case where __main__ is imported from a valid sys.path entry rather than being executed directly.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：更新以利用PEP 451添加的模块规范功能。如果从有效的sys.path条目中导入 __main__ 而不是直接执行 __cached__ ，则可以正确设置__cached__。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Use (',', ': ') as default if indent is not None.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：如果indent不为 None ，则默认使用 (',', ': ') 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Windows now uses the same implementation as all other platforms.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。Windows现在使用与所有其他平台相同的实现。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: Windows support added
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。增加了对Windows的支持

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: ZIP64 extensions are enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 在3.4版本中有所改变。默认启用ZIP64扩展。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: accepts any bytes-like object as input for encoding and decoding
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：接受任何类似字节的对象作为编码和解码的输入

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: accepts any bytes-like object as input for encoding and decoding
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：接受任何类似字节的对象作为编码和解码的输入

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: memoryview is now registered automatically with collections.abc.Sequence
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：memoryview现在自动向 collections.abc.Sequence 注册。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: the policy keyword argument was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中更改：添加了policy关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.4: the method was changed to use utf8=True, thus producing an RFC 6531-like message representation, instead of being a direct alias for as_string().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.4中进行了更改：方法已更改为使用 utf8=True ，从而生成 as_string() RFC 6531的消息表示形式，而不是as_string（）的直接别名。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5.1: A RecursionError exception is now raised if the new limit is too low at the current recursion depth.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5.1中进行了更改：如果在当前递归深度下新的限制太低，则会引发 RecursionError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5.1: The host parameter can be a sequence of strings.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5.1中更改：host参数可以是字符串序列。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5.1: The function accepts any awaitable object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5.1中更改：该函数接受任何等待的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5.1: The function accepts any awaitable object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5.1中更改：该函数接受任何等待的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5.2: address no longer needs to be resolved. sock_connect will try to check if the address is already resolved by calling socket.inet_pton(). If not, loop.getaddrinfo() will be used to resolve the address.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5.2版中进行了更改： address 不再需要解决。 sock_connect 将尝试通过调用 socket.inet_pton() 来检查地址是否已经解析。如果不是，则使用 loop.getaddrinfo() 解析地址。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5.2: On Linux, if the getrandom() syscall blocks (the urandom entropy pool is not initialized yet), fall back on reading /dev/urandom.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5.2中进行了更改：在Linux上，如果 getrandom() syscall阻塞（尚未初始化urandom熵池），请退回阅读 /dev/urandom 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5.3: loop.run_in_executor() no longer configures the max_workers of the thread pool executor it creates, instead leaving it up to the thread pool executor (ThreadPoolExecutor) to set the default.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5.3中进行了更改： loop.run_in_executor() 不再配置其创建的线程池执行程序的 max_workers ，而是将其留给线程池执行程序（ ThreadPoolExecutor ）来设置默认值。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5.3: Updated to support linking with OpenSSL 1.1.0
trans-unit.target: 在3.5.3版本中有所改变。更新为支持与OpenSSL 1.1.0的链接。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5:
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: AsyncFunctionDef is now supported.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在支持 AsyncFunctionDef 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: open() always creates a new database when the flag has the value 'n'.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：当标志的值为 'n' 时， open() 始终创建一个新数据库。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: DocTestSuite() returns an empty unittest.TestSuite if module contains no docstrings instead of raising ValueError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：如果模块不包含文档字符串而不是引发 ValueError ,则 DocTestSuite() 返回一个空的 unittest.TestSuite 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: SMTPNotSupportedError may be raised, and the initial_response_ok parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：可能会引发 SMTPNotSupportedError ，并添加了initial_response_ok参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: AsyncFunctionDef is now supported.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在支持 AsyncFunctionDef 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: SMTPUTF8 support added, and SMTPNotSupportedError may be raised if SMTPUTF8 is specified but the server does not support it.
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.5版本： SMTPUTF8 添加支持， SMTPNotSupportedError 如果可能提出 SMTPUTF8 指定，但服务器不支持它。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: __eq__() now takes key and value into account.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改： __eq__() 现在考虑了 key 和 value 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: _charset also accepts Charset instances.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：_charset也接受 Charset 实例。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: allow_abbrev parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了allow_abbrev参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: charset keyword-only argument was added. The default charset of HTML document changed from 'ISO-8859-1' to 'utf-8'.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了charset仅关键字参数。HTML文档的默认字符集从 'ISO-8859-1' 更改为 'utf-8' 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: headers parameter is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：headers参数是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: localaddr and remoteaddr may now contain IPv6 addresses.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：localaddr和remoteaddr现在可能包含IPv6地址。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: quiet parameter was changed to a multilevel value.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：quiet参数已更改为多级值。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: read_data is now reset on each call to the mock.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在，每次调用嘲笑都会重置read_data。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: stdout and stderr attributes added
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了stdout和stderr属性

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: suffix, prefix, and dir may now be supplied in bytes in order to obtain a bytes return value. Prior to this, only str was allowed. suffix and prefix now accept and default to None to cause an appropriate default value to be used.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：现在可以以字节形式提供suffix，prefix和dir以获得字节返回值。在此之前，只允许使用str。后缀和前缀现在可以接受，并且默认为 None 以导致使用适当的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: A list of named tuplesFrameInfo(frame, filename, lineno, function, code_context, index) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：返回一个命名元组 FrameInfo(frame, filename, lineno, function, code_context, index) 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: A list of named tuplesFrameInfo(frame, filename, lineno, function, code_context, index) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：返回了一个命名元组 FrameInfo(frame, filename, lineno, function, code_context, index) 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Add __qualname__ and gi_yieldfrom attributes to generators.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：将 __qualname__ 和 gi_yieldfrom 属性添加到生成器。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added AWAIT and ASYNC tokens.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了 AWAIT 和 ASYNC 令牌。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added additional attributes.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:增加了附加属性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added debuglevel 2.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:增加了debuglevel 2。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added negative limit support.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了负限制支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support for SSL/TLS in ProactorEventLoop.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：在 ProactorEventLoop 中添加了对SSL / TLS的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support for Windows
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:增加了对Windows的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support for group references of fixed length.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:增加了对固定长度的组引用的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support for passing file descriptor to this function.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版的变化:增加了对传递文件描述符到该函数的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support for the xztar format.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了对xztar格式的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support for the context management protocol to the FieldStorage class.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：在 FieldStorage 类中添加了对上下文管理协议的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support for writing arbitrary bytes-like objects. The read() method now accepts an argument of None.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：增加了对写入任意类似字节的对象的支持。的 read() 方法现在接受的参数 None 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support for writing arbitrary bytes-like objects. The read() method now accepts an argument of None.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：增加了对写入任意类似字节的对象的支持。的 read() 方法现在接受的参数 None 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support for writing to unseekable streams. Added support for the 'x' mode.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了对写入不可搜索流的支持。添加了对 'x' 模式的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support of str instances.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了对 str 实例的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support of arbitrary iterables.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中的变化:增加了对任意迭代的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support of character streams.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:增加了对字符流的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added support of slicing.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:增加了对切片的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the -j, -r, and -qq options. -q option was changed to a multilevel value. -b will always produce a byte-code file ending in .pyc, never .pyo.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了 -j ， -r 和 -qq 选项。 -q 选项已更改为多级值。 -b 将始终生成以 .pyc 结尾的字节码文件，而不是 .pyo 结尾。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the chunksize argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了chunksize参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the context argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了context参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the copy_function keyword argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了copy_function关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the max_length parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了max_length参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the members parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了members参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the numeric_owner parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了numeric_owner参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the workers parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了worker参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the optional key and reverse parameters.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了可选的key和reverse参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the tb_locals parameter.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:增加了tb_locals参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Added the two-tuple form for the address constructor parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：为地址构造函数参数添加了两元组形式。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Always allow a server_hostname to be passed, even if OpenSSL does not have SNI.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中的改变:即使OpenSSL没有SNI,也总是允许传递server_hostname。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: As part of PEP 489, the builtin importer now implements Loader.create_module() and Loader.exec_module()
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：作为PEP 489的一部分，内置导入器现在实现了 Loader.create_module() 和 Loader.exec_module()

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Before Python 3.5, a time object was considered to be false if it represented midnight in UTC. This behavior was considered obscure and error-prone and has been removed in Python 3.5. See bpo-13936 for full details.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：在Python 3.5之前，如果 time 对象表示UTC的午夜，则认为该时间对象为false。这种行为被认为是晦涩且容易出错的，在Python 3.5中已被删除。有关完整详细信息，请参见bpo-13936。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Behavior updated to match the semantics defined in RFC 3986.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：更新了行为以匹配RFC 3986中定义的语义。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Behaviour updated to match the semantics defined in RFC 3986.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：更新了行为以匹配RFC 3986中定义的语义。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Discovery no longer checks package names for matching pattern due to the impossibility of package names matching the default pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：由于无法与默认模式匹配的软件包名称，发现不再检查软件包名称是否与模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Documentation strings are now inherited if not overridden.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:如果没有被覆盖,文档字符串现在可以继承。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: For HTTPS URIs, xmlrpc.client now performs all the necessary certificate and hostname checks by default.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：对于HTTPS URI， xmlrpc.client 现在默认情况下执行所有必要的证书和主机名检查。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Found packages are now checked for load_tests regardless of whether their path matches pattern, because it is impossible for a package name to match the default pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在，无论其路径是否与pattern匹配，现在都会对找到的程序包进行 load_tests 检查，因为程序包名称不可能与默认模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: If max_workers is None or not given, it will default to the number of processors on the machine, multiplied by 5, assuming that ThreadPoolExecutor is often used to overlap I/O instead of CPU work and the number of workers should be higher than the number of workers for ProcessPoolExecutor.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：如果max_workers为 None 或未给出，它将默认为计算机上的处理器数量乘以 5 ，假设 ThreadPoolExecutor 通常用于重叠I / O而不是CPU工作，并且工作线程的数量应为高于 ProcessPoolExecutor 的工人人数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: If a ConnectionError or subclass is raised, the HTTPConnection object will be ready to reconnect when a new request is sent.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：如果引发 ConnectionError 或子类，则在发送新请求时， HTTPConnection 对象将准备好重新连接。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: If an ImportError or AttributeError occurs while traversing name then a synthetic test that raises that error when run will be returned. These errors are included in the errors accumulated by self.errors.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：如果遍历名称时发生 ImportError 或 AttributeError ，则将返回在运行时引发该错误的综合测试。这些错误包括在self.errors累积的错误中。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: If the current working directory – represented by an empty string – is no longer valid then None is returned but no value is cached in sys.path_importer_cache.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：如果当前工作目录（由空字符串表示）不再有效，则将返回 None ，但不会在 sys.path_importer_cache 中缓存任何值。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: If the system call is interrupted and the signal handler does not raise an exception, the function now retries the system call instead of raising an InterruptedError exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：如果系统调用被中断并且信号处理程序没有引发异常，则该函数现在重试系统调用，而不是引发 InterruptedError 异常（有关原理，请参阅PEP 475）。
