trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: If you are patching builtins in a module then you don’t need to pass create=True, it will be added by default.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：如果要修补模块中的内置文件，则无需传递 create=True ，它将默认添加。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: In earlier Python versions, the SSLSocket.send() method returned zero instead of raising SSLWantWriteError or SSLWantReadError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：在早期的Python版本中， SSLSocket.send() 方法返回零，而不是引发 SSLWantWriteError 或 SSLWantReadError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Instances of ServerProxy support the context manager protocol for closing the underlying transport.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改： ServerProxy 的实例支持上下文管理器协议来关闭基础传输。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Instances of ServerProxy support the context manager protocol for closing the underlying transport.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改： ServerProxy 的实例支持用于关闭基础传输的上下文管理器协议。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Interpret the input time as a time in UTC as specified by ‘GMT’ timezone in the input string. Local timezone was used previously. Return an integer (no fractions of a second in the input format)
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：将输入时间解释为UTC中输入字符串中“ GMT”时区指定的时间。以前使用本地时区。返回一个整数（输入格式中不包括秒）

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Introduced the RuntimeError transformation via from __future__ import generator_stop, see PEP 479.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改： from __future__ import generator_stop 引入了RuntimeError转换，请参阅PEP 479。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Made the method static.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:将该方法改为静态。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Matching of IP addresses, when present in the subjectAltName field of the certificate, is now supported.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中有所改变:当证书的subjectAltName字段中出现时,现在支持匹配IP地址。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: New methods __getnewargs__, __rmod__, casefold, format_map, isprintable, and maketrans.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：新方法 __getnewargs__ ， __rmod__ ， casefold ， format_map ， isprintable 和 maketrans 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: On Linux 3.17 and newer, the getrandom() syscall is now used when available. On OpenBSD 5.6 and newer, the C getentropy() function is now used. These functions avoid the usage of an internal file descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：在Linux 3.17和更高版本上，现在可以使用 getrandom() syscall。在OpenBSD 5.6和更高版本上，现在使用C getentropy() 函数。这些函数避免使用内部文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: On Windows, the function now also supports socket handles.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:在Windows上,该函数现在也支持套接字句柄。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Parameter objects are picklable and hashable.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中改变了:参数对象是可拾取和哈希的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Previously, TypeError was raised when null bytes were encountered in source.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：以前，在source中遇到空字节时 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Property docstrings became writeable.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:属性 docstrings变得可写。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Python now retries system calls when a syscall is interrupted by a signal, except if the signal handler raises an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale), instead of raising InterruptedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在，当信号中断系统调用时，Python现在重试系统调用，除非信号处理程序引发异常（有关原理，请参阅PEP 475），而不是引发 InterruptedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Result changed from a tuple to a namedtuple.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中有所改变。结果由元组改为命名元组。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Return a named tuple instead of a tuple.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中有所改变。返回一个命名元组而不是元组。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Signature objects are picklable and hashable.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中的变化:签名对象是可拾取和哈希的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Starting in Python 3.6, this method will not be optional when exec_module() is defined.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：从Python 3.6开始，定义 exec_module() 时，此方法将不是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Support for recursive globs using “**”.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：支持使用“ ** ”的递归glob 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Support for the “site-python” directory has been removed.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：删除了对“ site-python”目录的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Support for the with statement was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了对 with 语句的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Support for the with statement was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了对 with 语句的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Synchronized objects support the context manager protocol.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：同步对象支持上下文管理器协议。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Synchronized objects support the context manager protocol.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：同步对象支持上下文管理器协议。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The io.BufferedIOBase interface is now implemented and all of its reader operations are supported.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现已实现 io.BufferedIOBase 接口，并且支持其所有读取器操作。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The read() method now accepts an argument of None.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改： read() 方法现在接受参数 None 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The os.O_TMPFILE flag is now used if available.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：现在使用 os.O_TMPFILE 标志（如果可用）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The '.pyo' file extension is no longer replaced with '.py'.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改： '.pyo' 文件扩展名不再替换为 '.py' 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The 'backslashreplace' error handlers now works with decoding and translating.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：现在， 'backslashreplace' 错误处理程序可用于解码和翻译。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The 'x' (exclusive creation) mode was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了 'x' （专有创建）模式。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The respect_handler_level argument was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了 respect_handler_level 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The sendfile() method was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了 sendfile() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The shutdown() does not reset the socket timeout each time bytes are received or sent. The socket timeout is now to maximum total duration of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：每次接收或发送字节时， shutdown() 不会重置套接字超时。现在，套接字超时已达到关闭的最大总持续时间。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The backlog parameter is now optional.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：backlog参数现在是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The context parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了context参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The converters argument was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了converters参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The decode_data and enable_SMTPUTF8 parameters were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了encode_data和enable_SMTPUTF8参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The etype argument is ignored and inferred from the type of value.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：etype参数将被忽略，并根据value的类型进行推断。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The exc_info parameter can now accept exception instances.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：exc_info参数现在可以接受异常实例。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The exist_ok parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了exist_ok参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The legacy parameter only writes out .pyc files, not .pyo files no matter what the value of optimize is.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：legacy参数仅写出 .pyc 文件，而不写 .pyo 文件，无论optimize的值是多少。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The optimization parameter was added and the debug_override parameter was deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：添加了优化参数，并且不赞成使用debug_override参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The start parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了start参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The default ssl_version is changed from PROTOCOL_SSLv3 to PROTOCOL_TLS for maximum compatibility with modern servers.
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.5版本：默认SSL_VERSION从改变 PROTOCOL_SSLv3 到 PROTOCOL_TLS 与现代服务器的最大兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The default value for argument convert_charrefs is now True.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：参数convert_charrefs的默认值现在为 True 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The dictionary is created from stack items instead of creating an empty dictionary pre-sized to hold count items.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：字典是从堆栈项创建的，而不是创建一个预先设置大小以容纳计数项的空字典。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The docstrings of property objects are now writeable.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:属性对象的docstrings现在是可写的。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The error raised for lack of STARTTLS support is now the SMTPNotSupportedError subclass instead of the base SMTPException.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：由于缺少STARTTLS支持而引发的错误现在是 SMTPNotSupportedError 子类，而不是基本 SMTPException 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The full chained traceback is displayed instead of just the primary traceback.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:显示完整的链式回溯,而不仅仅是主回溯。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The function is now always available and always system-wide.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:该功能现在总是可用,而且总是在全系统范围内。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The function is now retried if interrupted by a signal not in sigset and the signal handler does not raise an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在，如果被不在sigset中的信号中断并且信号处理程序没有引发异常，则该函数将重试（有关原理，请参阅PEP 475）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The function is now retried with a recomputed timeout when interrupted by a signal, except if the signal handler raises an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale), instead of raising InterruptedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：现在，当信号中断时，函数将重新计算超时重试，除非信号处理程序引发异常（有关原理，请参阅PEP 475），而不是引发 InterruptedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The function is now retried with a recomputed timeout when interrupted by a signal, except if the signal handler raises an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale), instead of raising InterruptedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：现在，当信号中断时，函数将重新计算超时重试，除非信号处理程序引发异常（有关原理，请参阅PEP 475），而不是引发 InterruptedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The function is now retried with a recomputed timeout when interrupted by a signal, except if the signal handler raises an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale), instead of raising InterruptedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：现在，当信号中断时，函数将重新计算超时重试，除非信号处理程序引发异常（有关原理，请参阅PEP 475），而不是引发 InterruptedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The function is now retried with a recomputed timeout when interrupted by a signal, except if the signal handler raises an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale), instead of raising InterruptedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：现在，当信号中断时，函数将重新计算超时重试，除非信号处理程序引发异常（有关原理，请参阅PEP 475），而不是引发 InterruptedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The function is now retried with a recomputed timeout when interrupted by a signal, except if the signal handler raises an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale), instead of raising InterruptedError.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：现在，当信号中断时，函数将重新计算超时重试，除非信号处理程序引发异常（有关原理，请参阅PEP 475），而不是引发 InterruptedError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The function is now retried with the recomputed timeout if interrupted by a signal not in sigset and the signal handler does not raise an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在，如果被不在sigset中的信号中断并且信号处理程序没有引发异常，则该函数将使用重新计算的超时重试（基本原理请参见PEP 475）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The function now sleeps at least secs even if the sleep is interrupted by a signal, except if the signal handler raises an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在，即使睡眠被信号中断，该函数也将至少睡眠几秒钟，除非信号处理程序引发异常（有关原理，请参阅PEP 475）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The index() method added support for stop and start arguments.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：index（）方法添加了对stop和start参数的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The items, keys, and values views of OrderedDict now support reverse iteration using reversed().
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.5版本：该物品，钥匙，和值景色的 OrderedDict 现在支持使用反向迭代 reversed() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The items, keys, and values views of OrderedDict now support reverse iteration using reversed().
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.5版本：该物品，钥匙，和值景色的 OrderedDict 现在支持使用反向迭代 reversed() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The method now waits until the connection completes instead of raising an InterruptedError exception if the connection is interrupted by a signal, the signal handler doesn’t raise an exception and the socket is blocking or has a timeout (see the PEP 475 for the rationale).
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：如果连接被信号中断，信号处理程序没有引发异常并且套接字正在阻塞或具有超时（请参阅PEP），则该方法现在等待直到连接完成，而不是引发 InterruptedError 异常。475）。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The optional globals parameter was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：添加了可选的globals参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The output is now in the same order as the input. Use the --sort-keys option to sort the output of dictionaries alphabetically by key.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在，输出与输入的顺序相同。使用 --sort-keys 选项可以按字母顺序对字典的输出进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The selector is now retried with a recomputed timeout when interrupted by a signal if the signal handler did not raise an exception (see PEP 475 for the rationale), instead of returning an empty list of events before the timeout.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在，如果信号处理程序没有引发异常（请参阅PEP 475），则被信号中断时，选择器将被重新计算的超时重试，而不是在超时之前返回空的事件列表。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The socket timeout is no more reset each time bytes are received or sent. The socket timeout is now to maximum total duration of the handshake.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中的变化:不再在每次接收或发送字节时重置套接字超时。套接字超时时间现在是握手的最大总时间。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The socket timeout is no more reset each time bytes are received or sent. The socket timeout is now to maximum total duration to read up to len bytes.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：每次接收或发送字节时，套接字超时都不再重置。现在，套接字超时已达到最大总持续时间，最多可以读取len个字节。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The socket timeout is no more reset each time bytes are received or sent. The socket timeout is now to maximum total duration to write buf.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：每次接收或发送字节时，套接字超时都不再重置。现在，套接字超时已达到写入buf的最大总持续时间。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The socket timeout is no more reset each time data is sent successfully. The socket timeout is now the maximum total duration to send all data.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:每次成功发送数据时,不再重置套接字超时。套接字超时时间现在是发送所有数据的最大总时间。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The source format is no longer restricted when casting to a byte view.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:当投射到字节视图时,源格式不再受到限制。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The undocumented and unofficial use_load_tests default argument is deprecated and ignored, although it is still accepted for backward compatibility. The method also now accepts a keyword-only argument pattern which is passed to load_tests as the third argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：不推荐使用非官方的非官方use_load_tests默认参数，尽管该参数仍被接受以实现向后兼容，但仍将其忽略。该方法现在还接受仅关键字的参数模式，该模式作为第三个参数传递给 load_tests 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The use of venv is now recommended for creating virtual environments.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在建议使用 venv 创建虚拟环境。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: The value is no longer dependent on __debug__.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中更改：该值不再取决于 __debug__ 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: This function now calls os.scandir() instead of os.listdir(), making it faster by reducing the number of calls to os.stat().
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：此函数现在调用 os.scandir() 而不是 os.listdir() ，从而通过减少对 os.stat() 的调用次数使其变得更快。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Unmatched groups are replaced with an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:未匹配的组被替换为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Windows now returns the file index as st_ino when available.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：Windows现在在可用时将文件索引返回为 st_ino 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Windows support added.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:增加了对Windows的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Windows will now zero-fill files when extending.
trans-unit.target: 3.5版本的变化:Windows现在在扩展时将零填充文件。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Writable bytes-like object is now accepted.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在接受可写字节状对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: Writable bytes-like object is now accepted.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在接受可写字节状对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: an error is raised for invalid keys.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中更改了:无效键会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: memoryviews can now be indexed with tuple of integers.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中的变化:记忆视图现在可以用整数的元组来做索引。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: return a Morsel object instead of a dict.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版本中有所改变:返回一个Morsel对象而不是一个dict。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: signal (SIG*), handler (SIG_DFL, SIG_IGN) and sigmask (SIG_BLOCK, SIG_UNBLOCK, SIG_SETMASK) related constants listed below were turned into enums. getsignal(), pthread_sigmask(), sigpending() and sigwait() functions return human-readable enums.
trans-unit.target: 在3.5版中改为：信号（SIG *），处理（ SIG_DFL ， SIG_IGN ）和sigmask（ SIG_BLOCK ， SIG_UNBLOCK ， SIG_SETMASK ）下列有关的常数都变成了 enums 。 getsignal() ， pthread_sigmask() ， sigpending() 和 sigwait() 函数返回人类可读的 enums 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.5: string usernames and passwords are now encoded to utf-8 instead of being limited to ASCII.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.5中进行了更改：现在，字符串用户名和密码已编码为 utf-8 ,而不再限于ASCII。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.
trans-unit.target: 在3.6版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.0: On Linux, getrandom() is now used in blocking mode to increase the security.
trans-unit.target: 在3.6.0版中进行了更改：在Linux上， getrandom() 现在以阻止模式使用以提高安全性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.1: Added support for default values, methods, and docstrings.
trans-unit.target: 在3.6.1版本中有所改变。增加了对默认值、方法和docstrings的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.2: The file parameter accepts a path-like object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6.2中更改：file参数接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.2: The file parameter accepts a path-like object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6.2中更改：file参数接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.2: The filename parameter accepts a path-like object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6.2中更改：filename参数接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.2: The filename parameter accepts a path-like object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6.2中更改：filename参数接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.2: The path parameter accepts a path-like object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6.2中更改：path参数接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.2: The path parameter accepts a path-like object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6.2中更改：path参数接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.2: The pathname parameter accepts a path-like object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6.2中更改：pathname参数接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.2: The pathname parameter accepts a path-like object.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6.2中更改：pathname参数接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6.5: On Windows, TCP_FASTOPEN, TCP_KEEPCNT appear if run-time Windows supports.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6.5中更改：在Windows上，如果运行时Windows支持，则显示 TCP_FASTOPEN ， TCP_KEEPCNT 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6:
trans-unit.target: 在3.6版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: fromtimestamp() may return instances with fold set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 在3.6版中进行了更改： fromtimestamp() 可能返回 fold 设置为1的实例。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: create_module() must also be defined.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：还必须定义 create_module() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: sqlite3 used to implicitly commit an open transaction before DDL statements. This is no longer the case.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中进行了更改： sqlite3 用于在DDL语句之前隐式提交一个打开的事务。这已不再是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: __getnewargs_ex__() is now used in protocols 2 and 3.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改： __getnewargs_ex__() 现在在协议2和3中使用。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: re.LOCALE can be used only with bytes patterns and is not compatible with re.ASCII.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改： re.LOCALE 仅可用于字节模式，并且与 re.ASCII 不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: SSLContext.options returns Options flags:
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改： SSLContext.options 返回 Options 标志：

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: SSLContext.verify_flags returns VerifyFlags flags:
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中进行了更改： SSLContext.verify_flags 返回 VerifyFlags 标志：

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: SSLContext.verify_mode returns VerifyMode enum:
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改： SSLContext.verify_mode 返回 VerifyMode 枚举：

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: DomainFilter instances are now also accepted in filters.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中进行了更改： DomainFilter 实例现在也已在filter中接受。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: OSError is now raised if an error occurs when the underlying close() call is made.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中进行了更改：现在，如果在进行基础 close() 调用时发生错误，则会引发 OSError 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: open() can now be used to write files into the archive with the mode='w' option.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中进行了更改： open() 现在可用于通过 mode='w' 选项将文件写入存档。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: SIO_LOOPBACK_FAST_PATH was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：添加了 SIO_LOOPBACK_FAST_PATH 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: SO_DOMAIN, SO_PROTOCOL, SO_PEERSEC, SO_PASSSEC, TCP_USER_TIMEOUT, TCP_CONGESTION were added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：添加了 SO_DOMAIN ， SO_PROTOCOL ， SO_PEERSEC ， SO_PASSSEC ， TCP_USER_TIMEOUT ， TCP_CONGESTION 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: StreamRequestHandler.wfile also supports the io.BufferedIOBase writable interface.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改： StreamRequestHandler.wfile 还支持 io.BufferedIOBase 可写接口。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: _class defaults to the policy message_factory.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：_class默认为策略 message_factory 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: _factory defaults to the policy message_factory.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：_factory默认为策略 message_factory 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: args parameter accepts a path-like object if shell is False and a sequence containing path-like objects on POSIX.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：args参数在shell为 False 时接受类似路径的对象，并且在POSIX上包含包含类似路径的对象的序列。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: args parameter accepts a path-like object if shell is False and a sequence containing path-like objects on POSIX.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：args参数在shell为 False 时接受类似路径的对象，并且在POSIX上包含包含类似路径的对象的序列。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: cwd parameter accepts a path-like object on POSIX.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：cwd参数在POSIX上接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: cwd parameter accepts a path-like object on POSIX.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：cwd参数在POSIX上接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: decode_data is now False by default.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：默认情况下，decode_data现在为 False 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: delete is now supported as a keyword argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：现在支持delete作为关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: encoding and errors were added. See run() for details.
trans-unit.target: 在3.6版中进行了更改：添加了编码和错误。有关详细信息，请参见 run() 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: executable parameter accepts a path-like object on POSIX.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：可执行参数在POSIX上接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: executable parameter accepts a path-like object on POSIX.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：可执行参数在POSIX上接受类似路径的对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: fp can now be a binary file. The input encoding should be UTF-8, UTF-16 or UTF-32.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：fp现在可以是一个二进制文件。输入编码应为UTF-8，UTF-16或UTF-32。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: fp can now be a binary file. The input encoding should be UTF-8, UTF-16 or UTF-32.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：fp现在可以是一个二进制文件。输入编码应为UTF-8，UTF-16或UTF-32。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: items can be passed as separate arguments, not just as a single tuple.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：项目可以作为单独的参数传递，而不仅仅是单个元组。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: level can now be used as a keyword parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：现在可以将level用作关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: max_length can be used as a keyword argument.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：max_length可以用作关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: s can now be of type bytes or bytearray. The input encoding should be UTF-8, UTF-16 or UTF-32.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：s现在可以是 bytes 或 bytearray 类型。输入编码应为UTF-8，UTF-16或UTF-32。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: session argument was added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：添加了会话参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: wbits and bufsize can be used as keyword arguments.
trans-unit.target: 在版本3.6中更改：wbits和bufsize可用作关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: Accepts a path-like object for old and new.
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.6版本：接受一个路径状物体为老和新。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 3.6: Accepts a path-like object for path and attribute.
trans-unit.target: 改变在3.6版本：接受一个路径状物体的路径和属性。
